00023 /* ----- Defines for pixel clipping tests */
00024 
00025 #define clip_xmin(surface) surface->clip_rect.x
00026 #define clip_xmax(surface) surface->clip_rect.x+surface->clip_rect.w-1
00027 #define clip_ymin(surface) surface->clip_rect.y
00028 #define clip_ymax(surface) surface->clip_rect.y+surface->clip_rect.h-1
00029 
00040 int fastPixelColorNolock(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x, Sint16 y, Uint32 color)
00041 {
00042         int bpp;
00043         Uint8 *p;
00044 
00045         /*
00046         * Honor clipping setup at pixel level 
00047         */
00048         if ((x >= clip_xmin(dst)) && (x <= clip_xmax(dst)) && (y >= clip_ymin(dst)) && (y <= clip_ymax(dst))) {
00049 
00050                 /*
00051                 * Get destination format 
00052                 */
00053                 bpp = dst->format->BytesPerPixel;
00054                 p = (Uint8 *) dst->pixels + y * dst->pitch + x * bpp;
00055                 switch (bpp) {
00056         case 1:
00057                 *p = color;
00058                 break;
00059         case 2:
00060                 *(Uint16 *) p = color;
00061                 break;
00062         case 3:
00063                 if (SDL_BYTEORDER == SDL_BIG_ENDIAN) {
00064                         p[0] = (color >> 16) & 0xff;
00065                         p[1] = (color >> 8) & 0xff;
00066                         p[2] = color & 0xff;
00067                 } else {
00068                         p[0] = color & 0xff;
00069                         p[1] = (color >> 8) & 0xff;
00070                         p[2] = (color >> 16) & 0xff;
00071                 }
00072                 break;
00073         case 4:
00074                 *(Uint32 *) p = color;
00075                 break;
00076                 }                       /* switch */
00077 
00078 
00079         }
00080 
00081         return (0);
00082 }

00143 int fastPixelColor(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x, Sint16 y, Uint32 color)
00144 {
00145         int result;
00146 
00147         /*
00148         * Lock the surface 
00149         */
00150         if (SDL_MUSTLOCK(dst)) {
00151                 if (SDL_LockSurface(dst) < 0) {
00152                         return (-1);
00153                 }
00154         }
00155 
00156         result = fastPixelColorNolock(dst, x, y, color);
00157 
00158         /*
00159         * Unlock surface 
00160         */
00161         if (SDL_MUSTLOCK(dst)) {
00162                 SDL_UnlockSurface(dst);
00163         }
00164 
00165         return (result);
00166 }

00181 int fastPixelRGBA(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x, Sint16 y, Uint8 r, Uint8 g, Uint8 b, Uint8 a)
00182 {
00183         Uint32 color;
00184 
00185         /*
00186         * Setup color 
00187         */
00188         color = SDL_MapRGBA(dst->format, r, g, b, a);
00189 
00190         /*
00191         * Draw 
00192         */
00193         return (fastPixelColor(dst, x, y, color));

00239 int _putPixelAlpha(SDL_Surface *dst, Sint16 x, Sint16 y, Uint32 color, Uint8 alpha)
00240 {
00241         SDL_PixelFormat *format;
00242         Uint32 Rmask, Gmask, Bmask, Amask;
00243         Uint32 Rshift, Gshift, Bshift, Ashift;
00244         Uint32 R, G, B, A;
00245 
00246         if (dst == NULL)
00247         {
00248                 return (-1);
00249         }
00250 
00251         if (x >= clip_xmin(dst) && x <= clip_xmax(dst) && 
00252                 y >= clip_ymin(dst) && y <= clip_ymax(dst)) 
00253         {
00254 
00255                 format = dst->format;
00256 
00257                 switch (format->BytesPerPixel) {
00258         case 1:
00259                 {               /* Assuming 8-bpp */
00260                         if (alpha == 255) {
00261                                 *((Uint8 *) dst->pixels + y * dst->pitch + x) = color;
00262                         } else {
00263                                 Uint8 *pixel = (Uint8 *) dst->pixels + y * dst->pitch + x;
00264                                 SDL_Palette *palette = format->palette;
00265                                 SDL_Color *colors = palette->colors;
00266                                 SDL_Color dColor = colors[*pixel];
00267                                 SDL_Color sColor = colors[color];
00268                                 Uint8 dR = dColor.r;
00269                                 Uint8 dG = dColor.g;
00270                                 Uint8 dB = dColor.b;
00271                                 Uint8 sR = sColor.r;
00272                                 Uint8 sG = sColor.g;
00273                                 Uint8 sB = sColor.b;
00274 
00275                                 dR = dR + ((sR - dR) * alpha >> 8);
00276                                 dG = dG + ((sG - dG) * alpha >> 8);
00277                                 dB = dB + ((sB - dB) * alpha >> 8);
00278 
00279                                 *pixel = SDL_MapRGB(format, dR, dG, dB);
00280                         }
00281                 }
00282                 break;
00283 
00284         case 2:
00285                 {               /* Probably 15-bpp or 16-bpp */
00286                         if (alpha == 255) {
00287                                 *((Uint16 *) dst->pixels + y * dst->pitch / 2 + x) = color;
00288                         } else {
00289                                 Uint16 *pixel = (Uint16 *) dst->pixels + y * dst->pitch / 2 + x;
00290                                 Uint32 dc = *pixel;
00291 
00292                                 Rmask = format->Rmask;
00293                                 Gmask = format->Gmask;
00294                                 Bmask = format->Bmask;
00295                                 Amask = format->Amask;
00296                                 R = ((dc & Rmask) + (((color & Rmask) - (dc & Rmask)) * alpha >> 8)) & Rmask;
00297                                 G = ((dc & Gmask) + (((color & Gmask) - (dc & Gmask)) * alpha >> 8)) & Gmask;
00298                                 B = ((dc & Bmask) + (((color & Bmask) - (dc & Bmask)) * alpha >> 8)) & Bmask;
00299                                 if (Amask) {
00300                                         A = ((dc & Amask) + (((color & Amask) - (dc & Amask)) * alpha >> 8)) & Amask;
00301                                 }
00302                                 *pixel = R | G | B | A;
00303                         }
00304                 }
00305                 break;
00306 
00307         case 3: 
00308                 {               /* Slow 24-bpp mode, usually not used */
00309                         Uint8 Rshift8, Gshift8, Bshift8, Ashift8;
00310                         Uint8 *pixel = (Uint8 *) dst->pixels + y * dst->pitch + x * 3;
00311 
00312                         Rshift = format->Rshift;
00313                         Gshift = format->Gshift;
00314                         Bshift = format->Bshift;
00315                         Ashift = format->Ashift;
00316 
00317                         Rshift8 = Rshift / 8;
00318                         Gshift8 = Gshift / 8;
00319                         Bshift8 = Bshift / 8;
00320                         Ashift8 = Ashift / 8;
00321 
00322                         if (alpha == 255) {
00323                                 *(pixel + Rshift8) = color >> Rshift;
00324                                 *(pixel + Gshift8) = color >> Gshift;
00325                                 *(pixel + Bshift8) = color >> Bshift;
00326                                 *(pixel + Ashift8) = color >> Ashift;
00327                         } else {
00328                                 Uint8 dR, dG, dB, dA = 0;
00329                                 Uint8 sR, sG, sB, sA = 0;
00330 
00331                                 dR = *((pixel) + Rshift8);
00332                                 dG = *((pixel) + Gshift8);
00333                                 dB = *((pixel) + Bshift8);
00334                                 dA = *((pixel) + Ashift8);
00335 
00336                                 sR = (color >> Rshift) & 0xff;
00337                                 sG = (color >> Gshift) & 0xff;
00338                                 sB = (color >> Bshift) & 0xff;
00339                                 sA = (color >> Ashift) & 0xff;
00340 
00341                                 dR = dR + ((sR - dR) * alpha >> 8);
00342                                 dG = dG + ((sG - dG) * alpha >> 8);
00343                                 dB = dB + ((sB - dB) * alpha >> 8);
00344                                 dA = dA + ((sA - dA) * alpha >> 8);
00345 
00346                                 *((pixel) + Rshift8) = dR;
00347                                 *((pixel) + Gshift8) = dG;
00348                                 *((pixel) + Bshift8) = dB;
00349                                 *((pixel) + Ashift8) = dA;
00350                         }
00351                 }
00352                 break;
00353 
00354 #ifdef DEFAULT_ALPHA_PIXEL_ROUTINE
00355 
00356         case 4:
00357                 {               /* Probably :-) 32-bpp */
00358                         if (alpha == 255) {
00359                                 *((Uint32 *) dst->pixels + y * dst->pitch / 4 + x) = color;
00360                         } else {
00361                                 Uint32 *pixel = (Uint32 *) dst->pixels + y * dst->pitch / 4 + x;
00362                                 Uint32 dc = *pixel;
00363 
00364                                 Rmask = format->Rmask;
00365                                 Gmask = format->Gmask;
00366                                 Bmask = format->Bmask;
00367                                 Amask = format->Amask;
00368 
00369                                 Rshift = format->Rshift;
00370                                 Gshift = format->Gshift;
00371                                 Bshift = format->Bshift;
00372                                 Ashift = format->Ashift;
00373 
00374                                 A = 0;
00375                                 R = ((dc & Rmask) + (((((color & Rmask) - (dc & Rmask)) >> Rshift) * alpha >> 8) << Rshift)) & Rmask;
00376                                 G = ((dc & Gmask) + (((((color & Gmask) - (dc & Gmask)) >> Gshift) * alpha >> 8) << Gshift)) & Gmask;
00377                                 B = ((dc & Bmask) + (((((color & Bmask) - (dc & Bmask)) >> Bshift) * alpha >> 8) << Bshift)) & Bmask;
00378                                 if (Amask) {
00379                                         A = ((dc & Amask) + (((((color & Amask) - (dc & Amask)) >> Ashift) * alpha >> 8) << Ashift)) & Amask;
00380                                 }
00381                                 *pixel = R | G | B | A;
00382                         }
00383                 }
00384                 break;
00385 #endif
00386 
00387 #ifdef EXPERIMENTAL_ALPHA_PIXEL_ROUTINE
00388 
00389         case 4:{                /* Probably :-) 32-bpp */
00390                 if (alpha == 255) {
00391                         *((Uint32 *) dst->pixels + y * dst->pitch / 4 + x) = color;
00392                 } else {
00393                         Uint32 *pixel = (Uint32 *) dst->pixels + y * dst->pitch / 4 + x;
00394                         Uint32 dR, dG, dB, dA;
00395                         Uint32 dc = *pixel;
00396 
00397                         Uint32 surfaceAlpha, preMultR, preMultG, preMultB;
00398                         Uint32 aTmp;
00399 
00400                         Rmask = format->Rmask;
00401                         Gmask = format->Gmask;
00402                         Bmask = format->Bmask;
00403                         Amask = format->Amask;
00404 
00405                         dR = (color & Rmask);
00406                         dG = (color & Gmask);
00407                         dB = (color & Bmask);
00408                         dA = (color & Amask);
00409 
00410                         Rshift = format->Rshift;
00411                         Gshift = format->Gshift;
00412                         Bshift = format->Bshift;
00413                         Ashift = format->Ashift;
00414 
00415                         preMultR = (alpha * (dR >> Rshift));
00416                         preMultG = (alpha * (dG >> Gshift));
00417                         preMultB = (alpha * (dB >> Bshift));
00418 
00419                         surfaceAlpha = ((dc & Amask) >> Ashift);
00420                         aTmp = (255 - alpha);
00421                         if (A = 255 - ((aTmp * (255 - surfaceAlpha)) >> 8 )) {
00422                                 aTmp *= surfaceAlpha;
00423                                 R = (preMultR + ((aTmp * ((dc & Rmask) >> Rshift)) >> 8)) / A << Rshift & Rmask;
00424                                 G = (preMultG + ((aTmp * ((dc & Gmask) >> Gshift)) >> 8)) / A << Gshift & Gmask;
00425                                 B = (preMultB + ((aTmp * ((dc & Bmask) >> Bshift)) >> 8)) / A << Bshift & Bmask;
00426                         }
00427                         *pixel = R | G | B | (A << Ashift & Amask);
00428 
00429                 }
00430                    }
00431                    break;
00432 #endif
00433                 }
00434         }
00435 
00436         return (0);
00437 }
00438 
00449 int pixelColor(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x, Sint16 y, Uint32 color)
00450 {
00451         Uint8 alpha;
00452         Uint32 mcolor;
00453         int result = 0;
00454 
00455         /*
00456         * Lock the surface 
00457         */
00458         if (SDL_MUSTLOCK(dst)) {
00459                 if (SDL_LockSurface(dst) < 0) {
00460                         return (-1);
00461                 }
00462         }
00463 
00464         /*
00465         * Setup color 
00466         */
00467         alpha = color & 0x000000ff;
00468         mcolor =
00469                 SDL_MapRGBA(dst->format, (color & 0xff000000) >> 24,
00470                 (color & 0x00ff0000) >> 16, (color & 0x0000ff00) >> 8, alpha);
00471 
00472         /*
00473         * Draw 
00474         */
00475         result = _putPixelAlpha(dst, x, y, mcolor, alpha);
00476 
00477         /*
00478         * Unlock the surface 
00479         */
00480         if (SDL_MUSTLOCK(dst)) {
00481                 SDL_UnlockSurface(dst);
00482         }
00483 
00484         return (result);
00485 }

00508                 SDL_MapRGBA(dst->format, (color & 0xff000000) >> 24,

00510 
00511         /*
00512         * Draw 
00513         */

00515

00517 }

00535 int _filledRectAlpha(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x1, Sint16 y1, Sint16 x2, Sint16 y2, Uint32 color, Uint8 alpha)
00536 {
00537         SDL_PixelFormat *format;
00538         Uint32 Rmask, Bmask, Gmask, Amask;
00539         Uint32 Rshift, Bshift, Gshift, Ashift;
00540         Uint8 sR, sG, sB, sA;
00541         Uint32 R, G, B, A;
00542         Sint16 x, y;
00543 
00544         format = dst->format;
00545         switch (format->BytesPerPixel) {
00546         case 1:
00547                 {                       /* Assuming 8-bpp */
00548                         Uint8 *row, *pixel;
00549                         Uint8 dR, dG, dB;
00550                         SDL_Palette *palette = format->palette;
00551                         SDL_Color *colors = palette->colors;
00552                         sR = colors[color].r;
00553                         sG = colors[color].g;
00554                         sB = colors[color].b;
00555 
00556                         for (y = y1; y <= y2; y++) {
00557                                 row = (Uint8 *) dst->pixels + y * dst->pitch;
00558                                 for (x = x1; x <= x2; x++) {
00559                                         pixel = row + x;
00560 
00561                                         dR = colors[*pixel].r;
00562                                         dG = colors[*pixel].g;
00563                                         dB = colors[*pixel].b;
00564 
00565                                         dR = dR + ((sR - dR) * alpha >> 8);
00566                                         dG = dG + ((sG - dG) * alpha >> 8);
00567                                         dB = dB + ((sB - dB) * alpha >> 8);
00568 
00569                                         *pixel = SDL_MapRGB(format, dR, dG, dB);
00570                                 }
00571                         }
00572                 }
00573                 break;
00574 
00575         case 2:
00576                 {                       /* Probably 15-bpp or 16-bpp */
00577                         Uint16 *row, *pixel;
00578                         Uint32 dR, dG, dB, dA;
00579                         Rmask = format->Rmask;
00580                         Gmask = format->Gmask;
00581                         Bmask = format->Bmask;
00582                         Amask = format->Amask;
00583 
00584                         dR = (color & Rmask); 
00585                         dG = (color & Gmask);
00586                         dB = (color & Bmask);
00587                         dA = (color & Amask);
00588 
00589                         A = 0;
00590 
00591                         for (y = y1; y <= y2; y++) {
00592                                 row = (Uint16 *) dst->pixels + y * dst->pitch / 2;
00593                                 for (x = x1; x <= x2; x++) {
00594                                         pixel = row + x;
00595 
00596                                         R = ((*pixel & Rmask) + ((dR - (*pixel & Rmask)) * alpha >> 8)) & Rmask;
00597                                         G = ((*pixel & Gmask) + ((dG - (*pixel & Gmask)) * alpha >> 8)) & Gmask;
00598                                         B = ((*pixel & Bmask) + ((dB - (*pixel & Bmask)) * alpha >> 8)) & Bmask;
00599                                         if (Amask)
00600                                         {
00601                                                 A = ((*pixel & Amask) + ((dA - (*pixel & Amask)) * alpha >> 8)) & Amask;
00602                                                 *pixel = R | G | B | A;
00603                                         } else {
00604                                                 *pixel = R | G | B;
00605                                         }
00606                                 }
00607                         }
00608                 }
00609                 break;
00610 
00611         case 3:
00612                 {                       /* Slow 24-bpp mode, usually not used */
00613                         Uint8 *row, *pix;
00614                         Uint8 dR, dG, dB, dA;
00615                         Uint8 Rshift8, Gshift8, Bshift8, Ashift8;
00616 
00617                         Rshift = format->Rshift;
00618                         Gshift = format->Gshift;
00619                         Bshift = format->Bshift;
00620                         Ashift = format->Ashift;
00621 
00622                         Rshift8 = Rshift / 8;
00623                         Gshift8 = Gshift / 8;
00624                         Bshift8 = Bshift / 8;
00625                         Ashift8 = Ashift / 8;
00626 
00627                         sR = (color >> Rshift) & 0xff;
00628                         sG = (color >> Gshift) & 0xff;
00629                         sB = (color >> Bshift) & 0xff;
00630                         sA = (color >> Ashift) & 0xff;
00631 
00632                         for (y = y1; y <= y2; y++) {
00633                                 row = (Uint8 *) dst->pixels + y * dst->pitch;
00634                                 for (x = x1; x <= x2; x++) {
00635                                         pix = row + x * 3;
00636 
00637                                         dR = *((pix) + Rshift8);
00638                                         dG = *((pix) + Gshift8);
00639                                         dB = *((pix) + Bshift8);
00640                                         dA = *((pix) + Ashift8);
00641 
00642                                         dR = dR + ((sR - dR) * alpha >> 8);
00643                                         dG = dG + ((sG - dG) * alpha >> 8);
00644                                         dB = dB + ((sB - dB) * alpha >> 8);
00645                                         dA = dA + ((sA - dA) * alpha >> 8);
00646 
00647                                         *((pix) + Rshift8) = dR;
00648                                         *((pix) + Gshift8) = dG;
00649                                         *((pix) + Bshift8) = dB;
00650                                         *((pix) + Ashift8) = dA;
00651                                 }
00652                         }
00653                 }
00654                 break;
00655 
00656 #ifdef DEFAULT_ALPHA_PIXEL_ROUTINE
00657         case 4:
00658                 {                       /* Probably :-) 32-bpp */
00659                         Uint32 *row, *pixel;
00660                         Uint32 dR, dG, dB, dA;
00661 
00662                         Rmask = format->Rmask;
00663                         Gmask = format->Gmask;
00664                         Bmask = format->Bmask;
00665                         Amask = format->Amask;
00666 
00667                         Rshift = format->Rshift;
00668                         Gshift = format->Gshift;
00669                         Bshift = format->Bshift;
00670                         Ashift = format->Ashift;
00671 
00672                         dR = (color & Rmask);
00673                         dG = (color & Gmask);
00674                         dB = (color & Bmask);
00675                         dA = (color & Amask);
00676 
00677                         for (y = y1; y <= y2; y++) {
00678                                 row = (Uint32 *) dst->pixels + y * dst->pitch / 4;
00679                                 for (x = x1; x <= x2; x++) {
00680                                         pixel = row + x;
00681 
00682                                         R = ((*pixel & Rmask) + ((((dR - (*pixel & Rmask)) >> Rshift) * alpha >> 8) << Rshift)) & Rmask;
00683                                         G = ((*pixel & Gmask) + ((((dG - (*pixel & Gmask)) >> Gshift) * alpha >> 8) << Gshift)) & Gmask;
00684                                         B = ((*pixel & Bmask) + ((((dB - (*pixel & Bmask)) >> Bshift) * alpha >> 8) << Bshift)) & Bmask;
00685                                         if (Amask)
00686                                         {
00687                                                 A = ((*pixel & Amask) + ((((dA - (*pixel & Amask)) >> Ashift) * alpha >> 8) << Ashift)) & Amask;
00688                                                 *pixel = R | G | B | A;
00689                                         } else {
00690                                                 *pixel = R | G | B;
00691                                         }
00692                                 }
00693                         }
00694                 }
00695                 break;
00696 #endif
00697 
00698 #ifdef EXPERIMENTAL_ALPHA_PIXEL_ROUTINE
00699         case 4:{                        /* Probably :-) 32-bpp */
00700                 Uint32 *row, *pixel;
00701                 Uint32 dR, dG, dB, dA;
00702                 Uint32 dc;
00703                 Uint32 surfaceAlpha, preMultR, preMultG, preMultB;
00704                 Uint32 aTmp;
00705 
00706                 Rmask = format->Rmask;
00707                 Gmask = format->Gmask;
00708                 Bmask = format->Bmask;
00709                 Amask = format->Amask;
00710 
00711                 dR = (color & Rmask);
00712                 dG = (color & Gmask);
00713                 dB = (color & Bmask);
00714                 dA = (color & Amask);
00715 
00716                 Rshift = format->Rshift;
00717                 Gshift = format->Gshift;
00718                 Bshift = format->Bshift;
00719                 Ashift = format->Ashift;
00720 
00721                 preMultR = (alpha * (dR >> Rshift));
00722                 preMultG = (alpha * (dG >> Gshift));
00723                 preMultB = (alpha * (dB >> Bshift));
00724 
00725                 for (y = y1; y <= y2; y++) {
00726                         row = (Uint32 *) dst->pixels + y * dst->pitch / 4;
00727                         for (x = x1; x <= x2; x++) {
00728                                 pixel = row + x;
00729                                 dc = *pixel;
00730 
00731                                 surfaceAlpha = ((dc & Amask) >> Ashift);
00732                                 aTmp = (255 - alpha);
00733                                 if (A = 255 - ((aTmp * (255 - surfaceAlpha)) >> 8 )) {
00734                                         aTmp *= surfaceAlpha;
00735                                         R = (preMultR + ((aTmp * ((dc & Rmask) >> Rshift)) >> 8)) / A << Rshift & Rmask;
00736                                         G = (preMultG + ((aTmp * ((dc & Gmask) >> Gshift)) >> 8)) / A << Gshift & Gmask;
00737                                         B = (preMultB + ((aTmp * ((dc & Bmask) >> Bshift)) >> 8)) / A << Bshift & Bmask;
00738                                 }
00739                                 *pixel = R | G | B | (A << Ashift & Amask);
00740 
00741                         }
00742                 }
00743                    }
00744                    break;
00745 #endif
00746 
00747         }
00748 
00749         return (0);
00750 }
00751 
00764 int filledRectAlpha(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x1, Sint16 y1, Sint16 x2, Sint16 y2, Uint32 color)
00765 {
00766         Uint8 alpha;
00767         Uint32 mcolor;
00768         int result = 0;
00769 
00770         /*
00771         * Lock the surface 
00772         */
00773         if (SDL_MUSTLOCK(dst)) {
00774                 if (SDL_LockSurface(dst) < 0) {
00775                         return (-1);
00776                 }
00777         }
00778 
00779         /*
00780         * Setup color 
00781         */
00782         alpha = color & 0x000000ff;
00783         mcolor =
00784                 SDL_MapRGBA(dst->format, (color & 0xff000000) >> 24,
00785                 (color & 0x00ff0000) >> 16, (color & 0x0000ff00) >> 8, alpha);
00786 
00787         /*
00788         * Draw 
00789         */
00790         result = _filledRectAlpha(dst, x1, y1, x2, y2, mcolor, alpha);
00791 
00792         /*
00793         * Unlock the surface 
00794         */
00795         if (SDL_MUSTLOCK(dst)) {
00796                 SDL_UnlockSurface(dst);
00797         }
00798 
00799         return (result);
00800 }
00801 
00813 int _HLineAlpha(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x1, Sint16 x2, Sint16 y, Uint32 color)
00814 {
00815         return (filledRectAlpha(dst, x1, y, x2, y, color));
00816 }
00817 
00829 int _VLineAlpha(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x, Sint16 y1, Sint16 y2, Uint32 color)
00830 {
00831         return (filledRectAlpha(dst, x, y1, x, y2, color));
00832 }
00833 
00845 int pixelColorWeight(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x, Sint16 y, Uint32 color, Uint32 weight)
00846 {
00847         Uint32 a;
00848 
00849         /*
00850         * Get alpha 
00851         */
00852         a = (color & (Uint32) 0x000000ff);
00853 
00854         /*
00855         * Modify Alpha by weight 
00856         */
00857         a = ((a * weight) >> 8);
00858 
00859         return (pixelColor(dst, x, y, (color & (Uint32) 0xffffff00) | (Uint32) a));
00860 }
00861 
00873 int pixelColorWeightNolock(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x, Sint16 y, Uint32 color, Uint32 weight)
00874 {
00875         Uint32 a;
00876 
00877         /*
00878         * Get alpha 
00879         */
00880         a = (color & (Uint32) 0x000000ff);
00881 
00882         /*
00883         * Modify Alpha by weight 
00884         */
00885         a = ((a * weight) >> 8);
00886 
00887         return (pixelColorNolock(dst, x, y, (color & (Uint32) 0xffffff00) | (Uint32) a));
00888 }
00889 
00903 int pixelRGBA(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x, Sint16 y, Uint8 r, Uint8 g, Uint8 b, Uint8 a)
00904 {
00905         Uint32 color;
00906 
00907         /*
00908         * Check Alpha 
00909         */
00910         if (a == 255) {
00911                 /*
00912                 * No alpha blending required 
00913                 */
00914                 /*
00915                 * Setup color 
00916                 */
00917                 color = SDL_MapRGBA(dst->format, r, g, b, a);
00918                 /*
00919                 * Draw 
00920                 */
00921                 return (fastPixelColor(dst, x, y, color));
00922         } else {
00923                 /*
00924                 * Alpha blending required 
00925                 */
00926                 /*
00927                 * Draw 
00928                 */
00929                 return (pixelColor(dst, x, y, ((Uint32) r << 24) | ((Uint32) g << 16) | ((Uint32) b << 8) | (Uint32) a));
00930         }
00931 }
00932 
00933 
00949 int hlineColorStore(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x1, Sint16 x2, Sint16 y, Uint32 color)
00950 {
00951         Sint16 left, right, top, bottom;
00952         Uint8 *pixel, *pixellast;
00953         int dx;
00954         int pixx, pixy;
00955         Sint16 w;
00956         Sint16 xtmp;
00957         int result = -1;
00958 
00959         /*
00960         * Check visibility of clipping rectangle
00961         */
00962         if ((dst->clip_rect.w==0) || (dst->clip_rect.h==0)) {
00963                 return(0);
00964         }
00965 
00966         /*
00967         * Swap x1, x2 if required to ensure x1<=x2
00968         */
00969         if (x1 > x2) {
00970                 xtmp = x1;
00971                 x1 = x2;
00972                 x2 = xtmp;
00973         }
00974 
00975         /*
00976         * Get clipping boundary and
00977         * check visibility of hline 
00978         */
00979         left = dst->clip_rect.x;
00980         if (x2<left) {
00981                 return(0);
00982         }
00983         right = dst->clip_rect.x + dst->clip_rect.w - 1;
00984         if (x1>right) {
00985                 return(0);
00986         }
00987         top = dst->clip_rect.y;
00988         bottom = dst->clip_rect.y + dst->clip_rect.h - 1;
00989         if ((y<top) || (y>bottom)) {
00990                 return (0);
00991         }
00992 
00993         /*
00994         * Clip x 
00995         */
00996         if (x1 < left) {
00997                 x1 = left;
00998         }
00999         if (x2 > right) {
01000                 x2 = right;
01001         }
01002 
01003         /*
01004         * Calculate width 
01005         */
01006         w = x2 - x1;
01007 
01008         /*
01009         * Lock the surface 
01010         */
01011         if (SDL_MUSTLOCK(dst)) {
01012                 if (SDL_LockSurface(dst) < 0) {
01013                         return (-1);
01014                 }
01015         }
01016 
01017         /*
01018         * More variable setup 
01019         */
01020         dx = w;
01021         pixx = dst->format->BytesPerPixel;
01022         pixy = dst->pitch;
01023         pixel = ((Uint8 *) dst->pixels) + pixx * (int) x1 + pixy * (int) y;
01024 
01025         /*
01026         * Draw 
01027         */
01028         switch (dst->format->BytesPerPixel) {
01029         case 1:
01030                 memset(pixel, color, dx+1);
01031                 break;
01032         case 2:
01033                 pixellast = pixel + dx + dx;
01034                 for (; pixel <= pixellast; pixel += pixx) {
01035                         *(Uint16 *) pixel = color;
01036                 }
01037                 break;
01038         case 3:
01039                 pixellast = pixel + dx + dx + dx;
01040                 for (; pixel <= pixellast; pixel += pixx) {
01041                         if (SDL_BYTEORDER == SDL_BIG_ENDIAN) {
01042                                 pixel[0] = (color >> 16) & 0xff;
01043                                 pixel[1] = (color >> 8) & 0xff;
01044                                 pixel[2] = color & 0xff;
01045                         } else {
01046                                 pixel[0] = color & 0xff;
01047                                 pixel[1] = (color >> 8) & 0xff;
01048                                 pixel[2] = (color >> 16) & 0xff;
01049                         }
01050                 }
01051                 break;
01052         default:                /* case 4 */
01053                 dx = dx + dx;
01054                 pixellast = pixel + dx + dx;
01055                 for (; pixel <= pixellast; pixel += pixx) {
01056                         *(Uint32 *) pixel = color;
01057                 }
01058                 break;
01059         }
01060 
01061         /*
01062         * Unlock surface 
01063         */
01064         SDL_UnlockSurface(dst);
01065 
01066         /*
01067         * Set result code 
01068         */
01069         result = 0;
01070 
01071         return (result);
01072 }
01073 
01091 int hlineRGBAStore(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x1, Sint16 x2, Sint16 y, Uint8 r, Uint8 g, Uint8 b, Uint8 a)
01092 {
01093         /*
01094         * Draw 
01095         */
01096         return (hlineColorStore(dst, x1, x2, y, ((Uint32) r << 24) | ((Uint32) g << 16) | ((Uint32) b << 8) | (Uint32) a));
01097 }
01098 
01110 int hlineColor(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x1, Sint16 x2, Sint16 y, Uint32 color)
01111 {
01112         Sint16 left, right, top, bottom;
01113         Uint8 *pixel, *pixellast;
01114         int dx;
01115         int pixx, pixy;
01116         Sint16 xtmp;
01117         int result = -1;
01118         Uint8 *colorptr;
01119         Uint8 color3[3];
01120 
01121         /*
01122         * Check visibility of clipping rectangle
01123         */
01124         if ((dst->clip_rect.w==0) || (dst->clip_rect.h==0)) {
01125                 return(0);
01126         }
01127 
01128         /*
01129         * Swap x1, x2 if required to ensure x1<=x2
01130         */
01131         if (x1 > x2) {
01132                 xtmp = x1;
01133                 x1 = x2;
01134                 x2 = xtmp;
01135         }
01136 
01137         /*
01138         * Get clipping boundary and
01139         * check visibility of hline 
01140         */
01141         left = dst->clip_rect.x;
01142         if (x2<left) {
01143                 return(0);
01144         }
01145         right = dst->clip_rect.x + dst->clip_rect.w - 1;
01146         if (x1>right) {
01147                 return(0);
01148         }
01149         top = dst->clip_rect.y;
01150         bottom = dst->clip_rect.y + dst->clip_rect.h - 1;
01151         if ((y<top) || (y>bottom)) {
01152                 return (0);
01153         }
01154 
01155         /*
01156         * Clip x 
01157         */
01158         if (x1 < left) {
01159                 x1 = left;
01160         }
01161         if (x2 > right) {
01162                 x2 = right;
01163         }
01164 
01165         /*
01166         * Calculate width difference
01167         */
01168         dx = x2 - x1;
01169 
01170         /*
01171         * Alpha check 
01172         */
01173         if ((color & 255) == 255) {
01174 
01175                 /*
01176                 * No alpha-blending required 
01177                 */
01178 
01179                 /*
01180                 * Setup color 
01181                 */
01182                 colorptr = (Uint8 *) & color;
01183                 if (SDL_BYTEORDER == SDL_BIG_ENDIAN) {
01184                         color = SDL_MapRGBA(dst->format, colorptr[0], colorptr[1], colorptr[2], colorptr[3]);
01185                 } else {
01186                         color = SDL_MapRGBA(dst->format, colorptr[3], colorptr[2], colorptr[1], colorptr[0]);
01187                 }
01188 
01189                 /*
01190                 * Lock the surface 
01191                 */
01192                 if (SDL_MUSTLOCK(dst)) {
01193                         if (SDL_LockSurface(dst) < 0) {
01194                                 return (-1);
01195                         }
01196                 }
01197 
01198                 /*
01199                 * More variable setup 
01200                 */
01201                 pixx = dst->format->BytesPerPixel;
01202                 pixy = dst->pitch;
01203                 pixel = ((Uint8 *) dst->pixels) + pixx * (int) x1 + pixy * (int) y;
01204 
01205                 /*
01206                 * Draw 
01207                 */
01208                 switch (dst->format->BytesPerPixel) {
01209         case 1:
01210                 memset(pixel, color, dx + 1);
01211                 break;
01212         case 2:
01213                 pixellast = pixel + dx + dx;
01214                 for (; pixel <= pixellast; pixel += pixx) {
01215                         *(Uint16 *) pixel = color;
01216                 }
01217                 break;
01218         case 3:
01219                 pixellast = pixel + dx + dx + dx;
01220                 if (SDL_BYTEORDER == SDL_BIG_ENDIAN) {
01221                         color3[0] = (color >> 16) & 0xff;
01222                         color3[1] = (color >> 8) & 0xff;
01223                         color3[2] = color & 0xff;
01224                 } else {
01225                         color3[0] = color & 0xff;
01226                         color3[1] = (color >> 8) & 0xff;
01227                         color3[2] = (color >> 16) & 0xff;
01228                 }
01229                 for (; pixel <= pixellast; pixel += pixx) {
01230                         memcpy(pixel, color3, 3);
01231                 }
01232                 break;
01233         default:                /* case 4 */
01234                 dx = dx + dx;
01235                 pixellast = pixel + dx + dx;
01236                 for (; pixel <= pixellast; pixel += pixx) {
01237                         *(Uint32 *) pixel = color;
01238                 }
01239                 break;
01240                 }
01241 
01242                 /*
01243                 * Unlock surface 
01244                 */
01245                 SDL_UnlockSurface(dst);
01246 
01247                 /*
01248                 * Set result code 
01249                 */
01250                 result = 0;
01251 
01252         } else {
01253 
01254                 /*
01255                 * Alpha blending blit 
01256                 */
01257                 result = _HLineAlpha(dst, x1, x1 + dx, y, color);
01258         }
01259 
01260         return (result);
01261 }
01262 
01277 int hlineRGBA(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x1, Sint16 x2, Sint16 y, Uint8 r, Uint8 g, Uint8 b, Uint8 a)
01278 {
01279         /*
01280         * Draw 
01281         */
01282         return (hlineColor(dst, x1, x2, y, ((Uint32) r << 24) | ((Uint32) g << 16) | ((Uint32) b << 8) | (Uint32) a));
01283 }
01284 
01296 int vlineColor(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x, Sint16 y1, Sint16 y2, Uint32 color)
01297 {
01298         Sint16 left, right, top, bottom;
01299         Uint8 *pixel, *pixellast;
01300         int dy;
01301         int pixx, pixy;
01302         Sint16 h;
01303         Sint16 ytmp;
01304         int result = -1;
01305         Uint8 *colorptr;
01306 
01307         /*
01308         * Check visibility of clipping rectangle
01309         */
01310         if ((dst->clip_rect.w==0) || (dst->clip_rect.h==0)) {
01311                 return(0);
01312         }
01313 
01314         /*
01315         * Swap y1, y2 if required to ensure y1<=y2
01316         */
01317         if (y1 > y2) {
01318                 ytmp = y1;
01319                 y1 = y2;
01320                 y2 = ytmp;
01321         }
01322 
01323         /*
01324         * Get clipping boundary and
01325         * check visibility of vline 
01326         */
01327         left = dst->clip_rect.x;
01328         right = dst->clip_rect.x + dst->clip_rect.w - 1;
01329         if ((x<left) || (x>right)) {
01330                 return (0);
01331         }    
01332         top = dst->clip_rect.y;
01333         if (y2<top) {
01334                 return(0);
01335         }
01336         bottom = dst->clip_rect.y + dst->clip_rect.h - 1;
01337         if (y1>bottom) {
01338                 return(0);
01339         }
01340 
01341         /*
01342         * Clip x 
01343         */
01344         if (y1 < top) {
01345                 y1 = top;
01346         }
01347         if (y2 > bottom) {
01348                 y2 = bottom;
01349         }
01350 
01351         /*
01352         * Calculate height
01353         */
01354         h = y2 - y1;
01355 
01356         /*
01357         * Alpha check 
01358         */
01359         if ((color & 255) == 255) {
01360 
01361                 /*
01362                 * No alpha-blending required 
01363                 */
01364 
01365                 /*
01366                 * Setup color 
01367                 */
01368                 colorptr = (Uint8 *) & color;
01369                 if (SDL_BYTEORDER == SDL_BIG_ENDIAN) {
01370                         color = SDL_MapRGBA(dst->format, colorptr[0], colorptr[1], colorptr[2], colorptr[3]);
01371                 } else {
01372                         color = SDL_MapRGBA(dst->format, colorptr[3], colorptr[2], colorptr[1], colorptr[0]);
01373                 }
01374 
01375                 /*
01376                 * Lock the surface 
01377                 */
01378                 if (SDL_MUSTLOCK(dst)) {
01379                         if (SDL_LockSurface(dst) < 0) {
01380                                 return (-1);
01381                         }
01382                 }
01383 
01384                 /*
01385                 * More variable setup 
01386                 */
01387                 dy = h;
01388                 pixx = dst->format->BytesPerPixel;
01389                 pixy = dst->pitch;
01390                 pixel = ((Uint8 *) dst->pixels) + pixx * (int) x + pixy * (int) y1;
01391                 pixellast = pixel + pixy * dy;
01392 
01393                 /*
01394                 * Draw 
01395                 */
01396                 switch (dst->format->BytesPerPixel) {
01397         case 1:
01398                 for (; pixel <= pixellast; pixel += pixy) {
01399                         *(Uint8 *) pixel = color;
01400                 }
01401                 break;
01402         case 2:
01403                 for (; pixel <= pixellast; pixel += pixy) {
01404                         *(Uint16 *) pixel = color;
01405                 }
01406                 break;
01407         case 3:
01408                 for (; pixel <= pixellast; pixel += pixy) {
01409                         if (SDL_BYTEORDER == SDL_BIG_ENDIAN) {
01410                                 pixel[0] = (color >> 16) & 0xff;
01411                                 pixel[1] = (color >> 8) & 0xff;
01412                                 pixel[2] = color & 0xff;
01413                         } else {
01414                                 pixel[0] = color & 0xff;
01415                                 pixel[1] = (color >> 8) & 0xff;
01416                                 pixel[2] = (color >> 16) & 0xff;
01417                         }
01418                 }
01419                 break;
01420         default:                /* case 4 */
01421                 for (; pixel <= pixellast; pixel += pixy) {
01422                         *(Uint32 *) pixel = color;
01423                 }
01424                 break;
01425                 }
01426 
01427                 /*
01428                 * Unlock surface 
01429                 */
01430                 SDL_UnlockSurface(dst);
01431 
01432                 /*
01433                 * Set result code 
01434                 */
01435                 result = 0;
01436 
01437         } else {
01438 
01439                 /*
01440                 * Alpha blending blit 
01441                 */
01442 
01443                 result = _VLineAlpha(dst, x, y1, y1 + h, color);
01444 
01445         }
01446 
01447         return (result);
01448 }
01449 
01464 int vlineRGBA(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x, Sint16 y1, Sint16 y2, Uint8 r, Uint8 g, Uint8 b, Uint8 a)
01465 {
01466         /*
01467         * Draw 
01468         */
01469         return (vlineColor(dst, x, y1, y2, ((Uint32) r << 24) | ((Uint32) g << 16) | ((Uint32) b << 8) | (Uint32) a));
01470 }
01471 
01484 int rectangleColor(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x1, Sint16 y1, Sint16 x2, Sint16 y2, Uint32 color)
01485 {
01486         int result;
01487         Sint16 tmp;
01488 
01489         /* Check destination surface */
01490         if (dst == NULL)
01491         {
01492                 return -1;
01493         }
01494 
01495         /*
01496         * Check visibility of clipping rectangle
01497         */
01498         if ((dst->clip_rect.w==0) || (dst->clip_rect.h==0)) {
01499                 return 0;
01500         }
01501 
01502         /*
01503         * Test for special cases of straight lines or single point 
01504         */
01505         if (x1 == x2) {
01506                 if (y1 == y2) {
01507                         return (pixelColor(dst, x1, y1, color));
01508                 } else {
01509                         return (vlineColor(dst, x1, y1, y2, color));
01510                 }
01511         } else {
01512                 if (y1 == y2) {
01513                         return (hlineColor(dst, x1, x2, y1, color));
01514                 }
01515         }
01516 
01517         /*
01518         * Swap x1, x2 if required 
01519         */
01520         if (x1 > x2) {
01521                 tmp = x1;
01522                 x1 = x2;
01523                 x2 = tmp;
01524         }
01525 
01526         /*
01527         * Swap y1, y2 if required 
01528         */
01529         if (y1 > y2) {
01530                 tmp = y1;
01531                 y1 = y2;
01532                 y2 = tmp;
01533         }
01534 
01535         /*
01536         * Draw rectangle 
01537         */
01538         result = 0;
01539         result |= hlineColor(dst, x1, x2, y1, color);
01540         result |= hlineColor(dst, x1, x2, y2, color);
01541         y1 += 1;
01542         y2 -= 1;
01543         if (y1 <= y2) {
01544                 result |= vlineColor(dst, x1, y1, y2, color);
01545                 result |= vlineColor(dst, x2, y1, y2, color);
01546         }
01547 
01548         return (result);
01549 
01550 }
01551 
01567 int rectangleRGBA(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x1, Sint16 y1, Sint16 x2, Sint16 y2, Uint8 r, Uint8 g, Uint8 b, Uint8 a)
01568 {
01569         /*
01570         * Draw 
01571         */
01572         return (rectangleColor
01573                 (dst, x1, y1, x2, y2, ((Uint32) r << 24) | ((Uint32) g << 16) | ((Uint32) b << 8) | (Uint32) a));
01574 }
01575 
01589 int roundedRectangleColor(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x1, Sint16 y1, Sint16 x2, Sint16 y2, Sint16 rad, Uint32 color)
01590 {
01591         int result;
01592         Sint16 w, h, tmp;
01593         Sint16 xx1, xx2, yy1, yy2;
01594 
01595         /* 
01596         * Check destination surface 
01597         */
01598         if (dst == NULL)
01599         {
01600                 return -1;
01601         }
01602 
01603         /*
01604         * Check radius vor valid range
01605         */
01606         if (rad < 0) {
01607                 return -1;
01608         }
01609 
01610         /*
01611         * Special case - no rounding
01612         */
01613         if (rad == 0) {
01614                 return rectangleColor(dst, x1, y1, x2, y2, color);
01615         }
01616 
01617         /*
01618         * Check visibility of clipping rectangle
01619         */
01620         if ((dst->clip_rect.w==0) || (dst->clip_rect.h==0)) {
01621                 return 0;
01622         }
01623 
01624         /*
01625         * Test for special cases of straight lines or single point 
01626         */
01627         if (x1 == x2) {
01628                 if (y1 == y2) {
01629                         return (pixelColor(dst, x1, y1, color));
01630                 } else {
01631                         return (vlineColor(dst, x1, y1, y2, color));
01632                 }
01633         } else {
01634                 if (y1 == y2) {
01635                         return (hlineColor(dst, x1, x2, y1, color));
01636                 }
01637         }
01638 
01639         /*
01640         * Swap x1, x2 if required 
01641         */
01642         if (x1 > x2) {
01643                 tmp = x1;
01644                 x1 = x2;
01645                 x2 = tmp;
01646         }
01647 
01648         /*
01649         * Swap y1, y2 if required 
01650         */
01651         if (y1 > y2) {
01652                 tmp = y1;
01653                 y1 = y2;
01654                 y2 = tmp;
01655         }
01656 
01657         /*
01658         * Calculate width&height 
01659         */
01660         w = x2 - x1;
01661         h = y2 - y1;
01662 
01663         /*
01664         * Maybe adjust radius
01665         */
01666         if ((rad * 2) > w)  
01667         {
01668                 rad = w / 2;
01669         }
01670         if ((rad * 2) > h)
01671         {
01672                 rad = h / 2;
01673         }
01674 
01675         /*
01676         * Draw corners
01677         */
01678         result = 0;
01679         xx1 = x1 + rad;
01680         xx2 = x2 - rad;
01681         yy1 = y1 + rad;
01682         yy2 = y2 - rad;
01683         result |= arcColor(dst, xx1, yy1, rad, 180, 270, color);
01684         result |= arcColor(dst, xx2, yy1, rad, 270, 360, color);
01685         result |= arcColor(dst, xx1, yy2, rad,  90, 180, color);
01686         result |= arcColor(dst, xx2, yy2, rad,   0,  90, color);
01687 
01688         /*
01689         * Draw lines
01690         */
01691         if (xx1 <= xx2) {
01692                 result |= hlineColor(dst, xx1, xx2, y1, color);
01693                 result |= hlineColor(dst, xx1, xx2, y2, color);
01694         }
01695         if (yy1 <= yy2) {
01696                 result |= vlineColor(dst, x1, yy1, yy2, color);
01697                 result |= vlineColor(dst, x2, yy1, yy2, color);
01698         }
01699 
01700         return result;
01701 }
01702 
01719 int roundedRectangleRGBA(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x1, Sint16 y1, Sint16 x2, Sint16 y2, Sint16 rad, Uint8 r, Uint8 g, Uint8 b, Uint8 a)
01720 {
01721         /*
01722         * Draw 
01723         */
01724         return (roundedRectangleColor
01725                 (dst, x1, y1, x2, y2, rad, ((Uint32) r << 24) | ((Uint32) g << 16) | ((Uint32) b << 8) | (Uint32) a));
01726 }
01727 
01741 int roundedBoxColor(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x1, Sint16 y1, Sint16 x2, Sint16 y2, Sint16 rad, Uint32 color)
01742 {
01743         int result;
01744         Sint16 w, h, tmp;
01745         Sint16 xx1, xx2, yy1, yy2;
01746 
01747         /* 
01748         * Check destination surface 
01749         */
01750         if (dst == NULL)
01751         {
01752                 return -1;
01753         }
01754 
01755         /*
01756         * Check radius vor valid range
01757         */
01758         if (rad < 0) {
01759                 return -1;
01760         }
01761 
01762         /*
01763         * Special case - no rounding
01764         */
01765         if (rad == 0) {
01766                 return rectangleColor(dst, x1, y1, x2, y2, color);
01767         }
01768 
01769         /*
01770         * Check visibility of clipping rectangle
01771         */
01772         if ((dst->clip_rect.w==0) || (dst->clip_rect.h==0)) {
01773                 return 0;
01774         }
01775 
01776         /*
01777         * Test for special cases of straight lines or single point 
01778         */
01779         if (x1 == x2) {
01780                 if (y1 == y2) {
01781                         return (pixelColor(dst, x1, y1, color));
01782                 } else {
01783                         return (vlineColor(dst, x1, y1, y2, color));
01784                 }
01785         } else {
01786                 if (y1 == y2) {
01787                         return (hlineColor(dst, x1, x2, y1, color));
01788                 }
01789         }
01790 
01791         /*
01792         * Swap x1, x2 if required 
01793         */
01794         if (x1 > x2) {
01795                 tmp = x1;
01796                 x1 = x2;
01797                 x2 = tmp;
01798         }
01799 
01800         /*
01801         * Swap y1, y2 if required 
01802         */
01803         if (y1 > y2) {
01804                 tmp = y1;
01805                 y1 = y2;
01806                 y2 = tmp;
01807         }
01808 
01809         /*
01810         * Calculate width&height 
01811         */
01812         w = x2 - x1;
01813         h = y2 - y1;
01814 
01815         /*
01816         * Maybe adjust radius
01817         */
01818         if ((rad * 2) > w)  
01819         {
01820                 rad = w / 2;
01821         }
01822         if ((rad * 2) > h)
01823         {
01824                 rad = h / 2;
01825         }
01826 
01827         /*
01828         * Draw corners
01829         */
01830         result = 0;
01831         xx1 = x1 + rad;
01832         xx2 = x2 - rad;
01833         yy1 = y1 + rad;
01834         yy2 = y2 - rad;
01835         result |= filledPieColor(dst, xx1, yy1, rad, 180, 270, color);
01836         result |= filledPieColor(dst, xx2, yy1, rad, 270, 360, color);
01837         result |= filledPieColor(dst, xx1, yy2, rad,  90, 180, color);
01838         result |= filledPieColor(dst, xx2, yy2, rad,   0,  90, color);
01839 
01840         /*
01841         * Draw body
01842         */
01843         xx1++;
01844         xx2--;
01845         yy1++;
01846         yy2--;
01847         if (xx1 <= xx2) {
01848                 result |= boxColor(dst, xx1, y1, xx2, y2, color);
01849         }
01850         if (yy1 <= yy2) {
01851                 result |= boxColor(dst, x1, yy1, xx1-1, yy2, color);
01852                 result |= boxColor(dst, xx2+1, yy1, x2, yy2, color);
01853         }
01854 
01855         return result;
01856 }
01857 
01874 int roundedBoxRGBA(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x1, Sint16 y1, Sint16 x2,
01875                                    Sint16 y2, Sint16 rad, Uint8 r, Uint8 g, Uint8 b, Uint8 a)
01876 {
01877         /*
01878         * Draw 
01879         */
01880         return (roundedBoxColor
01881                 (dst, x1, y1, x2, y2, rad, ((Uint32) r << 24) | ((Uint32) g << 16) | ((Uint32) b << 8) | (Uint32) a));
01882 }
01883 
01884 /* --------- Clipping routines for line */
01885 
01886 /* Clipping based heavily on code from                       */
01887 /* http://www.ncsa.uiuc.edu/Vis/Graphics/src/clipCohSuth.c   */
01888 
01889 #define CLIP_LEFT_EDGE   0x1
01890 #define CLIP_RIGHT_EDGE  0x2
01891 #define CLIP_BOTTOM_EDGE 0x4
01892 #define CLIP_TOP_EDGE    0x8
01893 #define CLIP_INSIDE(a)   (!a)
01894 #define CLIP_REJECT(a,b) (a&b)
01895 #define CLIP_ACCEPT(a,b) (!(a|b))
01896 
01909 static int _clipEncode(Sint16 x, Sint16 y, Sint16 left, Sint16 top, Sint16 right, Sint16 bottom)
01910 {
01911         int code = 0;
01912 
01913         if (x < left) {
01914                 code |= CLIP_LEFT_EDGE;
01915         } else if (x > right) {
01916                 code |= CLIP_RIGHT_EDGE;
01917         }
01918         if (y < top) {
01919                 code |= CLIP_TOP_EDGE;
01920         } else if (y > bottom) {
01921                 code |= CLIP_BOTTOM_EDGE;
01922         }
01923         return code;
01924 }
01925 
01935 static int _clipLine(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 * x1, Sint16 * y1, Sint16 * x2, Sint16 * y2)
01936 {
01937         Sint16 left, right, top, bottom;
01938         int code1, code2;
01939         int draw = 0;
01940         Sint16 swaptmp;
01941         float m;
01942 
01943         /*
01944         * Get clipping boundary 
01945         */
01946         left = dst->clip_rect.x;
01947         right = dst->clip_rect.x + dst->clip_rect.w - 1;
01948         top = dst->clip_rect.y;
01949         bottom = dst->clip_rect.y + dst->clip_rect.h - 1;
01950 
01951         while (1) {
01952                 code1 = _clipEncode(*x1, *y1, left, top, right, bottom);
01953                 code2 = _clipEncode(*x2, *y2, left, top, right, bottom);
01954                 if (CLIP_ACCEPT(code1, code2)) {
01955                         draw = 1;
01956                         break;
01957                 } else if (CLIP_REJECT(code1, code2))
01958                         break;
01959                 else {
01960                         if (CLIP_INSIDE(code1)) {
01961                                 swaptmp = *x2;
01962                                 *x2 = *x1;
01963                                 *x1 = swaptmp;
01964                                 swaptmp = *y2;
01965                                 *y2 = *y1;
01966                                 *y1 = swaptmp;
01967                                 swaptmp = code2;
01968                                 code2 = code1;
01969                                 code1 = swaptmp;
01970                         }
01971                         if (*x2 != *x1) {
01972                                 m = (*y2 - *y1) / (float) (*x2 - *x1);
01973                         } else {
01974                                 m = 1.0f;
01975                         }
01976                         if (code1 & CLIP_LEFT_EDGE) {
01977                                 *y1 += (Sint16) ((left - *x1) * m);
01978                                 *x1 = left;
01979                         } else if (code1 & CLIP_RIGHT_EDGE) {
01980                                 *y1 += (Sint16) ((right - *x1) * m);
01981                                 *x1 = right;
01982                         } else if (code1 & CLIP_BOTTOM_EDGE) {
01983                                 if (*x2 != *x1) {
01984                                         *x1 += (Sint16) ((bottom - *y1) / m);
01985                                 }
01986                                 *y1 = bottom;
01987                         } else if (code1 & CLIP_TOP_EDGE) {
01988                                 if (*x2 != *x1) {
01989                                         *x1 += (Sint16) ((top - *y1) / m);
01990                                 }
01991                                 *y1 = top;
01992                         }
01993                 }
01994         }
01995 
01996         return draw;
01997 }
01998 
02011 int boxColor(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x1, Sint16 y1, Sint16 x2, Sint16 y2, Uint32 color)
02012 {
02013         Sint16 left, right, top, bottom;
02014         Uint8 *pixel, *pixellast;
02015         int x, dx;
02016         int dy;
02017         int pixx, pixy;
02018         Sint16 w, h, tmp;
02019         int result;
02020         Uint8 *colorptr;
02021 
02022         /*
02023         * Check visibility of clipping rectangle
02024         */
02025         if ((dst->clip_rect.w==0) || (dst->clip_rect.h==0)) {
02026                 return(0);
02027         }
02028 
02029         /*
02030         * Order coordinates to ensure that
02031         * x1<=x2 and y1<=y2 
02032         */
02033         if (x1 > x2) {
02034                 tmp = x1;
02035                 x1 = x2;
02036                 x2 = tmp;
02037         }
02038         if (y1 > y2) {
02039                 tmp = y1;
02040                 y1 = y2;
02041                 y2 = tmp;
02042         }
02043 
02044         /* 
02045         * Get clipping boundary and 
02046         * check visibility 
02047         */
02048         left = dst->clip_rect.x;
02049         if (x2<left) {
02050                 return(0);
02051         }
02052         right = dst->clip_rect.x + dst->clip_rect.w - 1;
02053         if (x1>right) {
02054                 return(0);
02055         }
02056         top = dst->clip_rect.y;
02057         if (y2<top) {
02058                 return(0);
02059         }
02060         bottom = dst->clip_rect.y + dst->clip_rect.h - 1;
02061         if (y1>bottom) {
02062                 return(0);
02063         }
02064 
02065         /* Clip all points */
02066         if (x1<left) { 
02067                 x1=left; 
02068         } else if (x1>right) {
02069                 x1=right;
02070         }
02071         if (x2<left) { 
02072                 x2=left; 
02073         } else if (x2>right) {
02074                 x2=right;
02075         }
02076         if (y1<top) { 
02077                 y1=top; 
02078         } else if (y1>bottom) {
02079                 y1=bottom;
02080         }
02081         if (y2<top) { 
02082                 y2=top; 
02083         } else if (y2>bottom) {
02084                 y2=bottom;
02085         }
02086 
02087         /*
02088         * Test for special cases of straight line or single point 
02089         */
02090         if (x1 == x2) {
02091                 if (y1 == y2) {
02092                         return (pixelColor(dst, x1, y1, color));
02093                 } else { 
02094                         return (vlineColor(dst, x1, y1, y2, color));
02095                 }
02096         }
02097         if (y1 == y2) {
02098                 return (hlineColor(dst, x1, x2, y1, color));
02099         }
02100 
02101         /*
02102         * Calculate width&height 
02103         */
02104         w = x2 - x1;
02105         h = y2 - y1;
02106 
02107         /*
02108         * Alpha check 
02109         */
02110         if ((color & 255) == 255) {
02111 
02112                 /*
02113                 * No alpha-blending required 
02114                 */
02115 
02116                 /*
02117                 * Setup color 
02118                 */
02119                 colorptr = (Uint8 *) & color;
02120                 if (SDL_BYTEORDER == SDL_BIG_ENDIAN) {
02121                         color = SDL_MapRGBA(dst->format, colorptr[0], colorptr[1], colorptr[2], colorptr[3]);
02122                 } else {
02123                         color = SDL_MapRGBA(dst->format, colorptr[3], colorptr[2], colorptr[1], colorptr[0]);
02124                 }
02125 
02126                 /*
02127                 * Lock the surface 
02128                 */
02129                 if (SDL_MUSTLOCK(dst)) {
02130                         if (SDL_LockSurface(dst) < 0) {
02131                                 return (-1);
02132                         }
02133                 }
02134 
02135                 /*
02136                 * More variable setup 
02137                 */
02138                 dx = w;
02139                 dy = h;
02140                 pixx = dst->format->BytesPerPixel;
02141                 pixy = dst->pitch;
02142                 pixel = ((Uint8 *) dst->pixels) + pixx * (int) x1 + pixy * (int) y1;
02143                 pixellast = pixel + pixx * dx + pixy * dy;
02144                 dx++;
02145 
02146                 /*
02147                 * Draw 
02148                 */
02149                 switch (dst->format->BytesPerPixel) {
02150         case 1:
02151                 for (; pixel <= pixellast; pixel += pixy) {
02152                         memset(pixel, (Uint8) color, dx);
02153                 }
02154                 break;
02155         case 2:
02156                 pixy -= (pixx * dx);
02157                 for (; pixel <= pixellast; pixel += pixy) {
02158                         for (x = 0; x < dx; x++) {
02159                                 *(Uint16*) pixel = color;
02160                                 pixel += pixx;
02161                         }
02162                 }
02163                 break;
02164         case 3:
02165                 pixy -= (pixx * dx);
02166                 for (; pixel <= pixellast; pixel += pixy) {
02167                         for (x = 0; x < dx; x++) {
02168                                 if (SDL_BYTEORDER == SDL_BIG_ENDIAN) {
02169                                         pixel[0] = (color >> 16) & 0xff;
02170                                         pixel[1] = (color >> 8) & 0xff;
02171                                         pixel[2] = color & 0xff;
02172                                 } else {
02173                                         pixel[0] = color & 0xff;
02174                                         pixel[1] = (color >> 8) & 0xff;
02175                                         pixel[2] = (color >> 16) & 0xff;
02176                                 }
02177                                 pixel += pixx;
02178                         }
02179                 }
02180                 break;
02181         default:                /* case 4 */
02182                 pixy -= (pixx * dx);
02183                 for (; pixel <= pixellast; pixel += pixy) {
02184                         for (x = 0; x < dx; x++) {
02185                                 *(Uint32 *) pixel = color;
02186                                 pixel += pixx;
02187                         }
02188                 }
02189                 break;
02190                 }
02191 
02192                 /*
02193                 * Unlock surface 
02194                 */
02195                 SDL_UnlockSurface(dst);
02196 
02197                 result = 0;
02198 
02199         } else {
02200 
02201                 result = filledRectAlpha(dst, x1, y1, x1 + w, y1 + h, color);
02202 
02203         }
02204 
02205         return (result);
02206 }
02207 
02223 int boxRGBA(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x1, Sint16 y1, Sint16 x2, Sint16 y2, Uint8 r, Uint8 g, Uint8 b, Uint8 a)
02224 {
02225         /*
02226         * Draw 
02227         */
02228         return (boxColor(dst, x1, y1, x2, y2, ((Uint32) r << 24) | ((Uint32) g << 16) | ((Uint32) b << 8) | (Uint32) a));
02229 }
02230 
02231 /* ----- Line */
02232 
02233 /* Non-alpha line drawing code adapted from routine          */
02234 /* by Pete Shinners, pete@shinners.org                       */
02235 /* Originally from pygame, http://pygame.seul.org            */
02236 
02237 #define ABS(a) (((a)<0) ? -(a) : (a))
02238 
02251 int lineColor(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x1, Sint16 y1, Sint16 x2, Sint16 y2, Uint32 color)
02252 {
02253         int pixx, pixy;
02254         int x, y;
02255         int dx, dy;
02256         int ax, ay;
02257         int sx, sy;
02258         int swaptmp;
02259         Uint8 *pixel;
02260         Uint8 *colorptr;
02261 
02262         /*
02263         * Clip line and test if we have to draw 
02264         */
02265         if (!(_clipLine(dst, &x1, &y1, &x2, &y2))) {
02266                 return (0);
02267         }
02268 
02269         /*
02270         * Test for special cases of straight lines or single point 
02271         */
02272         if (x1 == x2) {
02273                 if (y1 < y2) {
02274                         return (vlineColor(dst, x1, y1, y2, color));
02275                 } else if (y1 > y2) {
02276                         return (vlineColor(dst, x1, y2, y1, color));
02277                 } else {
02278                         return (pixelColor(dst, x1, y1, color));
02279                 }
02280         }
02281         if (y1 == y2) {
02282                 if (x1 < x2) {
02283                         return (hlineColor(dst, x1, x2, y1, color));
02284                 } else if (x1 > x2) {
02285                         return (hlineColor(dst, x2, x1, y1, color));
02286                 }
02287         }
02288 
02289         /*
02290         * Variable setup 
02291         */
02292         dx = x2 - x1;
02293         dy = y2 - y1;
02294         sx = (dx >= 0) ? 1 : -1;
02295         sy = (dy >= 0) ? 1 : -1;
02296 
02297         /* Lock surface */
02298         if (SDL_MUSTLOCK(dst)) {
02299                 if (SDL_LockSurface(dst) < 0) {
02300                         return (-1);
02301                 }
02302         }
02303 
02304         /*
02305         * Check for alpha blending 
02306         */
02307         if ((color & 255) == 255) {
02308 
02309                 /*
02310                 * No alpha blending - use fast pixel routines 
02311                 */
02312 
02313                 /*
02314                 * Setup color 
02315                 */
02316                 colorptr = (Uint8 *) & color;
02317                 if (SDL_BYTEORDER == SDL_BIG_ENDIAN) {
02318                         color = SDL_MapRGBA(dst->format, colorptr[0], colorptr[1], colorptr[2], colorptr[3]);
02319                 } else {
02320                         color = SDL_MapRGBA(dst->format, colorptr[3], colorptr[2], colorptr[1], colorptr[0]);
02321                 }
02322 
02323                 /*
02324                 * More variable setup 
02325                 */
02326                 dx = sx * dx + 1;
02327                 dy = sy * dy + 1;
02328                 pixx = dst->format->BytesPerPixel;
02329                 pixy = dst->pitch;
02330                 pixel = ((Uint8 *) dst->pixels) + pixx * (int) x1 + pixy * (int) y1;
02331                 pixx *= sx;
02332                 pixy *= sy;
02333                 if (dx < dy) {
02334                         swaptmp = dx;
02335                         dx = dy;
02336                         dy = swaptmp;
02337                         swaptmp = pixx;
02338                         pixx = pixy;
02339                         pixy = swaptmp;
02340                 }
02341 
02342                 /*
02343                 * Draw 
02344                 */
02345                 x = 0;
02346                 y = 0;
02347                 switch (dst->format->BytesPerPixel) {
02348         case 1:
02349                 for (; x < dx; x++, pixel += pixx) {
02350                         *pixel = color;
02351                         y += dy;
02352                         if (y >= dx) {
02353                                 y -= dx;
02354                                 pixel += pixy;
02355                         }
02356                 }
02357                 break;
02358         case 2:
02359                 for (; x < dx; x++, pixel += pixx) {
02360                         *(Uint16 *) pixel = color;
02361                         y += dy;
02362                         if (y >= dx) {
02363                                 y -= dx;
02364                                 pixel += pixy;
02365                         }
02366                 }
02367                 break;
02368         case 3:
02369                 for (; x < dx; x++, pixel += pixx) {
02370                         if (SDL_BYTEORDER == SDL_BIG_ENDIAN) {
02371                                 pixel[0] = (color >> 16) & 0xff;
02372                                 pixel[1] = (color >> 8) & 0xff;
02373                                 pixel[2] = color & 0xff;
02374                         } else {
02375                                 pixel[0] = color & 0xff;
02376                                 pixel[1] = (color >> 8) & 0xff;
02377                                 pixel[2] = (color >> 16) & 0xff;
02378                         }
02379                         y += dy;
02380                         if (y >= dx) {
02381                                 y -= dx;
02382                                 pixel += pixy;
02383                         }
02384                 }
02385                 break;
02386         default:                /* case 4 */
02387                 for (; x < dx; x++, pixel += pixx) {
02388                         *(Uint32 *) pixel = color;
02389                         y += dy;
02390                         if (y >= dx) {
02391                                 y -= dx;
02392                                 pixel += pixy;
02393                         }
02394                 }
02395                 break;
02396                 }
02397 
02398         } else {
02399 
02400                 /*
02401                 * Alpha blending required - use single-pixel blits 
02402                 */
02403 
02404                 ax = ABS(dx) << 1;
02405                 ay = ABS(dy) << 1;
02406                 x = x1;
02407                 y = y1;
02408                 if (ax > ay) {
02409                         int d = ay - (ax >> 1);
02410 
02411                         while (x != x2) {
02412                                 pixelColorNolock (dst, x, y, color);
02413                                 if (d > 0 || (d == 0 && sx == 1)) {
02414                                         y += sy;
02415                                         d -= ax;
02416                                 }
02417                                 x += sx;
02418                                 d += ay;
02419                         }
02420                 } else {
02421                         int d = ax - (ay >> 1);
02422 
02423                         while (y != y2) {
02424                                 pixelColorNolock (dst, x, y, color);
02425                                 if (d > 0 || ((d == 0) && (sy == 1))) {
02426                                         x += sx;
02427                                         d -= ay;
02428                                 }
02429                                 y += sy;
02430                                 d += ax;
02431                         }
02432                 }
02433                 pixelColorNolock (dst, x, y, color);
02434 
02435         }
02436 
02437         /* Unlock surface */
02438         if (SDL_MUSTLOCK(dst)) {
02439                 SDL_UnlockSurface(dst);
02440         }
02441 
02442         return (0);
02443 }
02444 
02460 int lineRGBA(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x1, Sint16 y1, Sint16 x2, Sint16 y2, Uint8 r, Uint8 g, Uint8 b, Uint8 a)
02461 {
02462         /*
02463         * Draw 
02464         */
02465         return (lineColor(dst, x1, y1, x2, y2, ((Uint32) r << 24) | ((Uint32) g << 16) | ((Uint32) b << 8) | (Uint32) a));
02466 }
02467 
02468 /* AA Line */
02469 
02470 #define AAlevels 256
02471 #define AAbits 8
02472 
02493 int _aalineColor(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x1, Sint16 y1, Sint16 x2, Sint16 y2, Uint32 color, int draw_endpoint)
02494 {
02495         Sint32 xx0, yy0, xx1, yy1;
02496         int result;
02497         Uint32 intshift, erracc, erradj;
02498         Uint32 erracctmp, wgt, wgtcompmask;
02499         int dx, dy, tmp, xdir, y0p1, x0pxdir;
02500 
02501         /*
02502         * Check visibility of clipping rectangle
02503         */
02504         if ((dst->clip_rect.w==0) || (dst->clip_rect.h==0)) {
02505                 return(0);
02506         }
02507 
02508         /*
02509         * Clip line and test if we have to draw 
02510         */
02511         if (!(_clipLine(dst, &x1, &y1, &x2, &y2))) {
02512                 return (0);
02513         }
02514 
02515         /*
02516         * Keep on working with 32bit numbers 
02517         */
02518         xx0 = x1;
02519         yy0 = y1;
02520         xx1 = x2;
02521         yy1 = y2;
02522 
02523         /*
02524         * Reorder points if required 
02525         */
02526         if (yy0 > yy1) {
02527                 tmp = yy0;
02528                 yy0 = yy1;
02529                 yy1 = tmp;
02530                 tmp = xx0;
02531                 xx0 = xx1;
02532                 xx1 = tmp;
02533         }
02534 
02535         /*
02536         * Calculate distance 
02537         */
02538         dx = xx1 - xx0;
02539         dy = yy1 - yy0;
02540 
02541         /*
02542         * Check for special cases 
02543         */
02544         if (dx == 0) {
02545                 /*
02546                 * Vertical line 
02547                 */
02548                 if (draw_endpoint)
02549                 {
02550                         return (vlineColor(dst, x1, y1, y2, color));
02551                 } else {
02552                         if (dy>0) {
02553                                 return (vlineColor(dst, x1, yy0, yy0+dy, color));
02554                         } else {
02555                                 return (pixelColor(dst, x1, y1, color));
02556                         }
02557                 }
02558         } else if (dy == 0) {
02559                 /*
02560                 * Horizontal line 
02561                 */
02562                 if (draw_endpoint)
02563                 {
02564                         return (hlineColor(dst, x1, x2, y1, color));
02565                 } else {
02566                         if (dx>0) {
02567                                 return (hlineColor(dst, xx0, xx0+dx, y1, color));
02568                         } else {
02569                                 return (pixelColor(dst, x1, y1, color));
02570                         }
02571                 }
02572         } else if ((dx == dy) && (draw_endpoint)) {
02573                 /*
02574                 * Diagonal line (with endpoint)
02575                 */
02576                 return (lineColor(dst, x1, y1, x2, y2, color));
02577         }
02578 
02579         /*
02580         * Adjust for negative dx and set xdir 
02581         */
02582         if (dx >= 0) {
02583                 xdir = 1;
02584         } else {
02585                 xdir = -1;
02586                 dx = (-dx);
02587         }
02588 
02589         /*
02590         * Line is not horizontal, vertical or diagonal (with endpoint)
02591         */
02592         result = 0;
02593 
02594         /*
02595         * Zero accumulator 
02596         */
02597         erracc = 0;
02598 
02599         /*
02600         * # of bits by which to shift erracc to get intensity level 
02601         */
02602         intshift = 32 - AAbits;
02603 
02604         /*
02605         * Mask used to flip all bits in an intensity weighting 
02606         */
02607         wgtcompmask = AAlevels - 1;
02608 
02609         /* Lock surface */
02610         if (SDL_MUSTLOCK(dst)) {
02611                 if (SDL_LockSurface(dst) < 0) {
02612                         return (-1);
02613                 }
02614         }
02615 
02616         /*
02617         * Draw the initial pixel in the foreground color 
02618         */
02619         result |= pixelColorNolock(dst, x1, y1, color);
02620 
02621         /*
02622         * x-major or y-major? 
02623         */
02624         if (dy > dx) {
02625 
02626                 /*
02627                 * y-major.  Calculate 16-bit fixed point fractional part of a pixel that
02628                 * X advances every time Y advances 1 pixel, truncating the result so that
02629                 * we won't overrun the endpoint along the X axis 
02630                 */
02631                 /*
02632                 * Not-so-portable version: erradj = ((Uint64)dx << 32) / (Uint64)dy; 
02633                 */
02634                 erradj = ((dx << 16) / dy) << 16;
02635 
02636                 /*
02637                 * draw all pixels other than the first and last 
02638                 */
02639                 x0pxdir = xx0 + xdir;
02640                 while (--dy) {
02641                         erracctmp = erracc;
02642                         erracc += erradj;
02643                         if (erracc <= erracctmp) {
02644                                 /*
02645                                 * rollover in error accumulator, x coord advances 
02646                                 */
02647                                 xx0 = x0pxdir;
02648                                 x0pxdir += xdir;
02649                         }
02650                         yy0++;          /* y-major so always advance Y */
02651 
02652                         /*
02653                         * the AAbits most significant bits of erracc give us the intensity
02654                         * weighting for this pixel, and the complement of the weighting for
02655                         * the paired pixel. 
02656                         */
02657                         wgt = (erracc >> intshift) & 255;
02658                         result |= pixelColorWeightNolock (dst, xx0, yy0, color, 255 - wgt);
02659                         result |= pixelColorWeightNolock (dst, x0pxdir, yy0, color, wgt);
02660                 }
02661 
02662         } else {
02663 
02664                 /*
02665                 * x-major line.  Calculate 16-bit fixed-point fractional part of a pixel
02666                 * that Y advances each time X advances 1 pixel, truncating the result so
02667                 * that we won't overrun the endpoint along the X axis. 
02668                 */
02669                 /*
02670                 * Not-so-portable version: erradj = ((Uint64)dy << 32) / (Uint64)dx; 
02671                 */
02672                 erradj = ((dy << 16) / dx) << 16;
02673 
02674                 /*
02675                 * draw all pixels other than the first and last 
02676                 */
02677                 y0p1 = yy0 + 1;
02678                 while (--dx) {
02679
