02680                         erracctmp = erracc;
02681                         erracc += erradj;
02682                         if (erracc <= erracctmp) {
02683                                 /*
02684                                 * Accumulator turned over, advance y 
02685                                 */
02686                                 yy0 = y0p1;
02687                                 y0p1++;
02688                         }
02689                         xx0 += xdir;    /* x-major so always advance X */
02690                         /*
02691                         * the AAbits most significant bits of erracc give us the intensity
02692                         * weighting for this pixel, and the complement of the weighting for
02693                         * the paired pixel. 
02694                         */
02695                         wgt = (erracc >> intshift) & 255;
02696                         result |= pixelColorWeightNolock (dst, xx0, yy0, color, 255 - wgt);
02697                         result |= pixelColorWeightNolock (dst, xx0, y0p1, color, wgt);
02698                 }
02699         }
02700 
02701         /*
02702         * Do we have to draw the endpoint 
02703         */
02704         if (draw_endpoint) {
02705                 /*
02706                 * Draw final pixel, always exactly intersected by the line and doesn't
02707                 * need to be weighted. 
02708                 */
02709                 result |= pixelColorNolock (dst, x2, y2, color);
02710         }
02711 
02712         /* Unlock surface */
02713         if (SDL_MUSTLOCK(dst)) {
02714                 SDL_UnlockSurface(dst);
02715         }
02716 
02717         return (result);
02718 }
02719 
02732 int aalineColor(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x1, Sint16 y1, Sint16 x2, Sint16 y2, Uint32 color)
02733 {
02734         return (_aalineColor(dst, x1, y1, x2, y2, color, 1));
02735 }
02736 
02752 int aalineRGBA(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x1, Sint16 y1, Sint16 x2, Sint16 y2, Uint8 r, Uint8 g, Uint8 b, Uint8 a)
02753 {
02754         return (_aalineColor
02755                 (dst, x1, y1, x2, y2, ((Uint32) r << 24) | ((Uint32) g << 16) | ((Uint32) b << 8) | (Uint32) a, 1));
02756 }
02757 
02758 
02759 /* ----- Circle */
02760 
02776 int circleColor(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x, Sint16 y, Sint16 rad, Uint32 color)
02777 {
02778         Sint16 left, right, top, bottom;
02779         int result;
02780         Sint16 x1, y1, x2, y2;
02781         Sint16 cx = 0;
02782         Sint16 cy = rad;
02783         Sint16 ocx = (Sint16) 0xffff;
02784         Sint16 ocy = (Sint16) 0xffff;
02785         Sint16 df = 1 - rad;
02786         Sint16 d_e = 3;
02787         Sint16 d_se = -2 * rad + 5;
02788         Sint16 xpcx, xmcx, xpcy, xmcy;
02789         Sint16 ypcy, ymcy, ypcx, ymcx;
02790         Uint8 *colorptr;
02791 
02792         /*
02793         * Check visibility of clipping rectangle
02794         */
02795         if ((dst->clip_rect.w==0) || (dst->clip_rect.h==0)) {
02796                 return(0);
02797         }
02798 
02799         /*
02800         * Sanity check radius 
02801         */
02802         if (rad < 0) {
02803                 return (-1);
02804         }
02805 
02806         /*
02807         * Special case for rad=0 - draw a point 
02808         */
02809         if (rad == 0) {
02810                 return (pixelColor(dst, x, y, color));
02811         }
02812 
02813         /*
02814         * Get circle and clipping boundary and 
02815         * test if bounding box of circle is visible 
02816         */
02817         x2 = x + rad;
02818         left = dst->clip_rect.x;
02819         if (x2<left) {
02820                 return(0);
02821         } 
02822         x1 = x - rad;
02823         right = dst->clip_rect.x + dst->clip_rect.w - 1;
02824         if (x1>right) {
02825                 return(0);
02826         } 
02827         y2 = y + rad;
02828         top = dst->clip_rect.y;
02829         if (y2<top) {
02830                 return(0);
02831         } 
02832         y1 = y - rad;
02833         bottom = dst->clip_rect.y + dst->clip_rect.h - 1;
02834         if (y1>bottom) {
02835                 return(0);
02836         } 
02837 
02838         /*
02839         * Draw circle 
02840         */
02841         result = 0;
02842 
02843         /* Lock surface */
02844         if (SDL_MUSTLOCK(dst)) {
02845                 if (SDL_LockSurface(dst) < 0) {
02846                         return (-1);
02847                 }
02848         }
02849 
02850         /*
02851         * Alpha Check 
02852         */
02853         if ((color & 255) == 255) {
02854 
02855                 /*
02856                 * No Alpha - direct memory writes 
02857                 */
02858 
02859                 /*
02860                 * Setup color 
02861                 */
02862                 colorptr = (Uint8 *) & color;
02863                 if (SDL_BYTEORDER == SDL_BIG_ENDIAN) {
02864                         color = SDL_MapRGBA(dst->format, colorptr[0], colorptr[1], colorptr[2], colorptr[3]);
02865                 } else {
02866                         color = SDL_MapRGBA(dst->format, colorptr[3], colorptr[2], colorptr[1], colorptr[0]);
02867                 }
02868 
02869                 /*
02870                 * Draw 
02871                 */
02872                 do {
02873                         ypcy = y + cy;
02874                         ymcy = y - cy;
02875                         if (cx > 0) {
02876                                 xpcx = x + cx;
02877                                 xmcx = x - cx;
02878                                 result |= fastPixelColorNolock(dst, xmcx, ypcy, color);
02879                                 result |= fastPixelColorNolock(dst, xpcx, ypcy, color);
02880                                 result |= fastPixelColorNolock(dst, xmcx, ymcy, color);
02881                                 result |= fastPixelColorNolock(dst, xpcx, ymcy, color);
02882                         } else {
02883                                 result |= fastPixelColorNolock(dst, x, ymcy, color);
02884                                 result |= fastPixelColorNolock(dst, x, ypcy, color);
02885                         }
02886                         xpcy = x + cy;
02887                         xmcy = x - cy;
02888                         if ((cx > 0) && (cx != cy)) {
02889                                 ypcx = y + cx;
02890                                 ymcx = y - cx;
02891                                 result |= fastPixelColorNolock(dst, xmcy, ypcx, color);
02892                                 result |= fastPixelColorNolock(dst, xpcy, ypcx, color);
02893                                 result |= fastPixelColorNolock(dst, xmcy, ymcx, color);
02894                                 result |= fastPixelColorNolock(dst, xpcy, ymcx, color);
02895                         } else if (cx == 0) {
02896                                 result |= fastPixelColorNolock(dst, xmcy, y, color);
02897                                 result |= fastPixelColorNolock(dst, xpcy, y, color);
02898                         }
02899                         /*
02900                         * Update 
02901                         */
02902                         if (df < 0) {
02903                                 df += d_e;
02904                                 d_e += 2;
02905                                 d_se += 2;
02906                         } else {
02907                                 df += d_se;
02908                                 d_e += 2;
02909                                 d_se += 4;
02910                                 cy--;
02911                         }
02912                         cx++;
02913                 } while (cx <= cy);
02914 
02915                 /*
02916                 * Unlock surface 
02917                 */
02918                 SDL_UnlockSurface(dst);
02919 
02920         } else {
02921 
02922                 /*
02923                 * Using Alpha - blended pixel blits 
02924                 */
02925 
02926                 do {
02927                         /*
02928                         * Draw 
02929                         */
02930                         ypcy = y + cy;
02931                         ymcy = y - cy;
02932                         if (cx > 0) {
02933                                 xpcx = x + cx;
02934                                 xmcx = x - cx;
02935                                 result |= pixelColorNolock (dst, xmcx, ypcy, color);
02936                                 result |= pixelColorNolock (dst, xpcx, ypcy, color);
02937                                 result |= pixelColorNolock (dst, xmcx, ymcy, color);
02938                                 result |= pixelColorNolock (dst, xpcx, ymcy, color);
02939                         } else {
02940                                 result |= pixelColorNolock (dst, x, ymcy, color);
02941                                 result |= pixelColorNolock (dst, x, ypcy, color);
02942                         }
02943                         xpcy = x + cy;
02944                         xmcy = x - cy;
02945                         if ((cx > 0) && (cx != cy)) {
02946                                 ypcx = y + cx;
02947                                 ymcx = y - cx;
02948                                 result |= pixelColorNolock (dst, xmcy, ypcx, color);
02949                                 result |= pixelColorNolock (dst, xpcy, ypcx, color);
02950                                 result |= pixelColorNolock (dst, xmcy, ymcx, color);
02951                                 result |= pixelColorNolock (dst, xpcy, ymcx, color);
02952                         } else if (cx == 0) {
02953                                 result |= pixelColorNolock (dst, xmcy, y, color);
02954                                 result |= pixelColorNolock (dst, xpcy, y, color);
02955                         }
02956                         /*
02957                         * Update 
02958                         */
02959                         if (df < 0) {
02960                                 df += d_e;
02961                                 d_e += 2;
02962                                 d_se += 2;
02963                         } else {
02964                                 df += d_se;
02965                                 d_e += 2;
02966                                 d_se += 4;
02967                                 cy--;
02968                         }
02969                         cx++;
02970                 } while (cx <= cy);
02971 
02972         }                               /* Alpha check */
02973 
02974         /* Unlock surface */
02975         if (SDL_MUSTLOCK(dst)) {
02976                 SDL_UnlockSurface(dst);
02977         }
02978 
02979         return (result);
02980 }
02981 
02996 int circleRGBA(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x, Sint16 y, Sint16 rad, Uint8 r, Uint8 g, Uint8 b, Uint8 a)
02997 {
02998         /*
02999         * Draw 
03000         */
03001         return (circleColor(dst, x, y, rad, ((Uint32) r << 24) | ((Uint32) g << 16) | ((Uint32) b << 8) | (Uint32) a));
03002 }
03003 
03004 /* ----- Arc */
03005 
03023 int arcColor(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x, Sint16 y, Sint16 rad, Sint16 start, Sint16 end, Uint32 color)
03024 {
03025         Sint16 left, right, top, bottom;
03026         int result;
03027         Sint16 x1, y1, x2, y2;
03028         Sint16 cx = 0;
03029         Sint16 cy = rad;
03030         Sint16 ocx = (Sint16) 0xffff;
03031         Sint16 ocy = (Sint16) 0xffff;
03032         Sint16 df = 1 - rad;
03033         Sint16 d_e = 3;
03034         Sint16 d_se = -2 * rad + 5;
03035         Sint16 xpcx, xmcx, xpcy, xmcy;
03036         Sint16 ypcy, ymcy, ypcx, ymcx;
03037         Uint8 *colorptr;
03038         Uint8 drawoct;
03039         int startoct, endoct, oct, stopval_start, stopval_end;
03040         double temp;
03041 
03042         /*
03043         * Check visibility of clipping rectangle
03044         */
03045         if ((dst->clip_rect.w==0) || (dst->clip_rect.h==0)) {
03046                 return(0);
03047         }
03048 
03049         /*
03050         * Sanity check radius 
03051         */
03052         if (rad < 0) {
03053                 return (-1);
03054         }
03055 
03056         /*
03057         * Special case for rad=0 - draw a point 
03058         */
03059         if (rad == 0) {
03060                 return (pixelColor(dst, x, y, color));
03061         }
03062 
03063         /*
03064         * Get arc's circle and clipping boundary and 
03065         * test if bounding box of circle is visible 
03066         */
03067         x2 = x + rad;
03068         left = dst->clip_rect.x;
03069         if (x2<left) {
03070                 return(0);
03071         } 
03072         x1 = x - rad;
03073         right = dst->clip_rect.x + dst->clip_rect.w - 1;
03074         if (x1>right) {
03075                 return(0);
03076         } 
03077         y2 = y + rad;
03078         top = dst->clip_rect.y;
03079         if (y2<top) {
03080                 return(0);
03081         } 
03082         y1 = y - rad;
03083         bottom = dst->clip_rect.y + dst->clip_rect.h - 1;
03084         if (y1>bottom) {
03085                 return(0);
03086         }  
03087 
03088         // Octant labelling
03089         //      
03090         //  \ 5 | 6 /
03091         //   \  |  /
03092         //  4 \ | / 7
03093         //     \|/
03094         //------+------ +x
03095         //     /|\
03096         //  3 / | \ 0
03097         //   /  |  \
03098         //  / 2 | 1 \
03099         //      +y
03100 
03101         // Initially reset bitmask to 0x00000000
03102         // the set whether or not to keep drawing a given octant.
03103         // For example: 0x00111100 means we're drawing in octants 2-5
03104         drawoct = 0; 
03105 
03106         /*
03107         * Fixup angles
03108         */
03109         start %= 360;
03110         end %= 360;
03111         // 0 <= start & end < 360; note that sometimes start > end - if so, arc goes back through 0.
03112         while (start < 0) start += 360;
03113         while (end < 0) end += 360;
03114         start %= 360;
03115         end %= 360;
03116 
03117         // now, we find which octants we're drawing in.
03118         startoct = start / 45;
03119         endoct = end / 45;
03120         oct = startoct - 1; // we increment as first step in loop
03121 
03122         // stopval_start, stopval_end; 
03123         // what values of cx to stop at.
03124         do {
03125                 oct = (oct + 1) % 8;
03126 
03127                 if (oct == startoct) {
03128                         // need to compute stopval_start for this octant.  Look at picture above if this is unclear
03129                         switch (oct) 
03130                         {
03131                         case 0:
03132                         case 3:
03133                                 temp = sin(start * M_PI / 180);
03134                                 break;
03135                         case 1:
03136                         case 6:
03137                                 temp = cos(start * M_PI / 180);
03138                                 break;
03139                         case 2:
03140                         case 5:
03141                                 temp = -cos(start * M_PI / 180);
03142                                 break;
03143                         case 4:
03144                         case 7:
03145                                 temp = -sin(start * M_PI / 180);
03146                                 break;
03147                         }
03148                         temp *= rad;
03149                         stopval_start = (int)temp; // always round down.
03150                         // This isn't arbitrary, but requires graph paper to explain well.
03151                         // The basic idea is that we're always changing drawoct after we draw, so we
03152                         // stop immediately after we render the last sensible pixel at x = ((int)temp).
03153 
03154                         // and whether to draw in this octant initially
03155                         if (oct % 2) drawoct |= (1 << oct); // this is basically like saying drawoct[oct] = true, if drawoct were a bool array
03156                         else             drawoct &= 255 - (1 << oct); // this is basically like saying drawoct[oct] = false
03157                 }
03158                 if (oct == endoct) {
03159                         // need to compute stopval_end for this octant
03160                         switch (oct)
03161                         {
03162                         case 0:
03163                         case 3:
03164                                 temp = sin(end * M_PI / 180);
03165                                 break;
03166                         case 1:
03167                         case 6:
03168                                 temp = cos(end * M_PI / 180);
03169                                 break;
03170                         case 2:
03171                         case 5:
03172                                 temp = -cos(end * M_PI / 180);
03173                                 break;
03174                         case 4:
03175                         case 7:
03176                                 temp = -sin(end * M_PI / 180);
03177                                 break;
03178                         }
03179                         temp *= rad;
03180                         stopval_end = (int)temp;
03181 
03182                         // and whether to draw in this octant initially
03183                         if (startoct == endoct) {
03184                                 // note:      we start drawing, stop, then start again in this case
03185                                 // otherwise: we only draw in this octant, so initialize it to false, it will get set back to true
03186                                 if (start > end) {
03187                                         // unfortunately, if we're in the same octant and need to draw over the whole circle, 
03188                                         // we need to set the rest to true, because the while loop will end at the bottom.
03189                                         drawoct = 255;
03190                                 } else {
03191                                         drawoct &= 255 - (1 << oct);
03192                                 }
03193                         } 
03194                         else if (oct % 2) drawoct &= 255 - (1 << oct);
03195                         else                      drawoct |= (1 << oct);
03196                 } else if (oct != startoct) { // already verified that it's != endoct
03197                         drawoct |= (1 << oct); // draw this entire segment
03198                 }
03199         } while (oct != endoct);
03200 
03201         // so now we have what octants to draw and when to draw them.  all that's left is the actual raster code.
03202 
03203         /* Lock surface */
03204         if (SDL_MUSTLOCK(dst)) {
03205                 if (SDL_LockSurface(dst) < 0) {
03206                         return (-1);
03207                 }
03208         }
03209 
03210         /*
03211         * Draw arc 
03212         */
03213         result = 0;
03214 
03215         /*
03216         * Alpha Check 
03217         */
03218         if ((color & 255) == 255) {
03219 
03220                 /*
03221                 * No Alpha - direct memory writes 
03222                 */
03223 
03224                 /*
03225                 * Setup color 
03226                 */
03227                 colorptr = (Uint8 *) & color;
03228                 if (SDL_BYTEORDER == SDL_BIG_ENDIAN) {
03229                         color = SDL_MapRGBA(dst->format, colorptr[0], colorptr[1], colorptr[2], colorptr[3]);
03230                 } else {
03231                         color = SDL_MapRGBA(dst->format, colorptr[3], colorptr[2], colorptr[1], colorptr[0]);
03232                 }
03233 
03234                 /*
03235                 * Draw 
03236                 */
03237                 do {
03238                         ypcy = y + cy;
03239                         ymcy = y - cy;
03240                         if (cx > 0) {
03241                                 xpcx = x + cx;
03242                                 xmcx = x - cx;
03243                                 // always check if we're drawing a certain octant before adding a pixel to that octant.
03244                                 if (drawoct & 4)  result |= fastPixelColorNolock(dst, xmcx, ypcy, color); // drawoct & 4 = 22; drawoct[2]
03245                                 if (drawoct & 2)  result |= fastPixelColorNolock(dst, xpcx, ypcy, color);
03246                                 if (drawoct & 32) result |= fastPixelColorNolock(dst, xmcx, ymcy, color);
03247                                 if (drawoct & 64) result |= fastPixelColorNolock(dst, xpcx, ymcy, color);
03248                         } else {
03249                                 if (drawoct & 6)  result |= fastPixelColorNolock(dst, x, ypcy, color); // 4 + 2; drawoct[2] || drawoct[1]
03250                                 if (drawoct & 96) result |= fastPixelColorNolock(dst, x, ymcy, color); // 32 + 64
03251                         }
03252 
03253                         xpcy = x + cy;
03254                         xmcy = x - cy;
03255                         if (cx > 0 && cx != cy) {
03256                                 ypcx = y + cx;
03257                                 ymcx = y - cx;
03258                                 if (drawoct & 8)   result |= fastPixelColorNolock(dst, xmcy, ypcx, color);
03259                                 if (drawoct & 1)   result |= fastPixelColorNolock(dst, xpcy, ypcx, color);
03260                                 if (drawoct & 16)  result |= fastPixelColorNolock(dst, xmcy, ymcx, color);
03261                                 if (drawoct & 128) result |= fastPixelColorNolock(dst, xpcy, ymcx, color);
03262                         } else if (cx == 0) {
03263                                 if (drawoct & 24)  result |= fastPixelColorNolock(dst, xmcy, y, color); // 8 + 16
03264                                 if (drawoct & 129) result |= fastPixelColorNolock(dst, xpcy, y, color); // 1 + 128
03265                         }
03266 
03267                         /*
03268                         * Update whether we're drawing an octant
03269                         */
03270                         if (stopval_start == cx) {
03271                                 // works like an on-off switch because start & end may be in the same octant.
03272                                 if (drawoct & (1 << startoct)) drawoct &= 255 - (1 << startoct);                
03273                                 else drawoct |= (1 << startoct);
03274                         }
03275                         if (stopval_end == cx) {
03276                                 if (drawoct & (1 << endoct)) drawoct &= 255 - (1 << endoct);
03277                                 else drawoct |= (1 << endoct);
03278                         }
03279 
03280                         /*
03281                         * Update pixels
03282                         */
03283                         if (df < 0) {
03284                                 df += d_e;
03285                                 d_e += 2;
03286                                 d_se += 2;
03287                         } else {
03288                                 df += d_se;
03289                                 d_e += 2;
03290                                 d_se += 4;
03291                                 cy--;
03292                         }
03293                         cx++;
03294                 } while (cx <= cy);
03295 
03296                 /*
03297                 * Unlock surface 
03298                 */
03299                 SDL_UnlockSurface(dst);
03300 
03301         } else {
03302 
03303                 /*
03304                 * Using Alpha - blended pixel blits 
03305                 */
03306 
03307                 do {
03308                         ypcy = y + cy;
03309                         ymcy = y - cy;
03310                         if (cx > 0) {
03311                                 xpcx = x + cx;
03312                                 xmcx = x - cx;
03313 
03314                                 // always check if we're drawing a certain octant before adding a pixel to that octant.
03315                                 if (drawoct & 4)  result |= pixelColorNolock(dst, xmcx, ypcy, color);
03316                                 if (drawoct & 2)  result |= pixelColorNolock(dst, xpcx, ypcy, color);
03317                                 if (drawoct & 32) result |= pixelColorNolock(dst, xmcx, ymcy, color);
03318                                 if (drawoct & 64) result |= pixelColorNolock(dst, xpcx, ymcy, color);
03319                         } else {
03320                                 if (drawoct & 96) result |= pixelColorNolock(dst, x, ymcy, color);
03321                                 if (drawoct & 6)  result |= pixelColorNolock(dst, x, ypcy, color);
03322                         }
03323 
03324                         xpcy = x + cy;
03325                         xmcy = x - cy;
03326                         if (cx > 0 && cx != cy) {
03327                                 ypcx = y + cx;
03328                                 ymcx = y - cx;
03329                                 if (drawoct & 8)   result |= pixelColorNolock(dst, xmcy, ypcx, color);
03330                                 if (drawoct & 1)   result |= pixelColorNolock(dst, xpcy, ypcx, color);
03331                                 if (drawoct & 16)  result |= pixelColorNolock(dst, xmcy, ymcx, color);
03332                                 if (drawoct & 128) result |= pixelColorNolock(dst, xpcy, ymcx, color);
03333                         } else if (cx == 0) {
03334                                 if (drawoct & 24)  result |= pixelColorNolock(dst, xmcy, y, color);
03335                                 if (drawoct & 129) result |= pixelColorNolock(dst, xpcy, y, color);
03336                         }
03337 
03338                         /*
03339                         * Update whether we're drawing an octant
03340                         */
03341                         if (stopval_start == cx) {
03342                                 // works like an on-off switch.  
03343                                 // This is just in case start & end are in the same octant.
03344                                 if (drawoct & (1 << startoct)) drawoct &= 255 - (1 << startoct);                
03345                                 else                                               drawoct |= (1 << startoct);
03346                         }
03347                         if (stopval_end == cx) {
03348                                 if (drawoct & (1 << endoct)) drawoct &= 255 - (1 << endoct);
03349                                 else                                             drawoct |= (1 << endoct);
03350                         }
03351 
03352                         /*
03353                         * Update pixels
03354                         */
03355                         if (df < 0) {
03356                                 df += d_e;
03357                                 d_e += 2;
03358                                 d_se += 2;
03359                         } else {
03360                                 df += d_se;
03361                                 d_e += 2;
03362                                 d_se += 4;
03363                                 cy--;
03364                         }
03365                         cx++;
03366                 } while (cx <= cy);
03367 
03368         }                               /* Alpha check */
03369 
03370         /* Unlock surface */
03371         if (SDL_MUSTLOCK(dst)) {
03372                 SDL_UnlockSurface(dst);
03373         }
03374 
03375         return (result);
03376 }
03377 
03394 int arcRGBA(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x, Sint16 y, Sint16 rad, Sint16 start, Sint16 end, Uint8 r, Uint8 g, Uint8 b, Uint8 a)
03395 {
03396         /*
03397         * Draw 
03398         */
03399         return (arcColor(dst, x, y, rad, start, end, ((Uint32) r << 24) | ((Uint32) g << 16) | ((Uint32) b << 8) | (Uint32) a));
03400 }

03402 /* ----- AA Circle */
03403 
03404 
03418 int aacircleColor(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x, Sint16 y, Sint16 rad, Uint32 color)
03419 {
03420         return (aaellipseColor(dst, x, y, rad, rad, color));
03421 }
03422 
03437 int aacircleRGBA(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x, Sint16 y, Sint16 rad, Uint8 r, Uint8 g, Uint8 b, Uint8 a)
03438 {
03439         /*
03440         * Draw 
03441         */

03443                 (dst, x, y, rad, rad, ((Uint32) r << 24) | ((Uint32) g << 16) | ((Uint32) b << 8) | (Uint32) a));

03445 
03446 /* ----- Filled Circle */
03447 
03462 int filledCircleColor(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x, Sint16 y, Sint16 rad, Uint32 color)
03463 {
03464         Sint16 left, right, top, bottom;
03465         int result;
03466         Sint16 x1, y1, x2, y2;
03467         Sint16 cx = 0;
03468         Sint16 cy = rad;
03469         Sint16 ocx = (Sint16) 0xffff;
03470         Sint16 ocy = (Sint16) 0xffff;
03471         Sint16 df = 1 - rad;
03472         Sint16 d_e = 3;
03473         Sint16 d_se = -2 * rad + 5;
03474         Sint16 xpcx, xmcx, xpcy, xmcy;
03475         Sint16 ypcy, ymcy, ypcx, ymcx;
03476 
03477         /*
03478         * Check visibility of clipping rectangle
03479         */
03480         if ((dst->clip_rect.w==0) || (dst->clip_rect.h==0)) {
03481                 return(0);
03482         }
03483 
03484         /*
03485         * Sanity check radius 
03486         */
03487         if (rad < 0) {
03488                 return (-1);
03489         }
03490 
03491         /*
03492         * Special case for rad=0 - draw a point 
03493         */
03494         if (rad == 0) {
03495                 return (pixelColor(dst, x, y, color));
03496         }
03497 
03498         /*
03499         * Get circle and clipping boundary and 
03500         * test if bounding box of circle is visible 
03501         */
03502         x2 = x + rad;
03503         left = dst->clip_rect.x;
03504         if (x2<left) {
03505                 return(0);
03506         } 
03507         x1 = x - rad;
03508         right = dst->clip_rect.x + dst->clip_rect.w - 1;
03509         if (x1>right) {
03510                 return(0);
03511         } 
03512         y2 = y + rad;
03513         top = dst->clip_rect.y;
03514         if (y2<top) {
03515                 return(0);
03516         } 
03517         y1 = y - rad;
03518         bottom = dst->clip_rect.y + dst->clip_rect.h - 1;
03519         if (y1>bottom) {
03520                 return(0);
03521         } 
03522 
03523         /*
03524         * Draw 
03525         */
03526         result = 0;
03527         do {
03528                 xpcx = x + cx;
03529                 xmcx = x - cx;
03530                 xpcy = x + cy;
03531                 xmcy = x - cy;
03532                 if (ocy != cy) {
03533                         if (cy > 0) {
03534                                 ypcy = y + cy;
03535                                 ymcy = y - cy;
03536                                 result |= hlineColor(dst, xmcx, xpcx, ypcy, color);
03537                                 result |= hlineColor(dst, xmcx, xpcx, ymcy, color);
03538                         } else {
03539                                 result |= hlineColor(dst, xmcx, xpcx, y, color);
03540                         }
03541                         ocy = cy;
03542                 }
03543                 if (ocx != cx) {
03544                         if (cx != cy) {
03545                                 if (cx > 0) {
03546                                         ypcx = y + cx;
03547                                         ymcx = y - cx;
03548                                         result |= hlineColor(dst, xmcy, xpcy, ymcx, color);
03549                                         result |= hlineColor(dst, xmcy, xpcy, ypcx, color);
03550                                 } else {
03551                                         result |= hlineColor(dst, xmcy, xpcy, y, color);
03552                                 }
03553                         }
03554                         ocx = cx;
03555                 }
03556                 /*
03557                 * Update 
03558                 */
03559                 if (df < 0) {
03560                         df += d_e;
03561                         d_e += 2;
03562                         d_se += 2;
03563                 } else {
03564                         df += d_se;
03565                         d_e += 2;
03566                         d_se += 4;
03567                         cy--;
03568                 }
03569                 cx++;
03570         } while (cx <= cy);
03571 
03572         return (result);
03573 }
03574 
03589 int filledCircleRGBA(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x, Sint16 y, Sint16 rad, Uint8 r, Uint8 g, Uint8 b, Uint8 a)
03590 {
03591         /*
03592         * Draw 
03593         */
03594         return (filledCircleColor
03595                 (dst, x, y, rad, ((Uint32) r << 24) | ((Uint32) g << 16) | ((Uint32) b << 8) | (Uint32) a));
03596 }
03597 
03598 /* ----- Ellipse */
03599 
03615 int ellipseColor(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x, Sint16 y, Sint16 rx, Sint16 ry, Uint32 color)
03616 {
03617         Sint16 left, right, top, bottom;
03618         int result;
03619         Sint16 x1, y1, x2, y2;
03620         int ix, iy;
03621         int h, i, j, k;
03622         int oh, oi, oj, ok;
03623         int xmh, xph, ypk, ymk;
03624         int xmi, xpi, ymj, ypj;
03625         int xmj, xpj, ymi, ypi;
03626         int xmk, xpk, ymh, yph;
03627         Uint8 *colorptr;
03628 
03629         /*
03630         * Check visibility of clipping rectangle
03631         */
03632         if ((dst->clip_rect.w==0) || (dst->clip_rect.h==0)) {
03633                 return(0);
03634         }
03635 
03636         /*
03637         * Sanity check radii 
03638         */
03639         if ((rx < 0) || (ry < 0)) {
03640                 return (-1);
03641         }
03642 
03643         /*
03644         * Special case for rx=0 - draw a vline 
03645         */
03646         if (rx == 0) {
03647                 return (vlineColor(dst, x, y - ry, y + ry, color));
03648         }
03649         /*
03650         * Special case for ry=0 - draw a hline 
03651         */
03652         if (ry == 0) {
03653                 return (hlineColor(dst, x - rx, x + rx, y, color));
03654         }
03655 
03656         /*
03657         * Get circle and clipping boundary and 
03658         * test if bounding box of circle is visible 
03659         */
03660         x2 = x + rx;
03661         left = dst->clip_rect.x;
03662         if (x2<left) {
03663                 return(0);
03664         } 
03665         x1 = x - rx;
03666         right = dst->clip_rect.x + dst->clip_rect.w - 1;
03667         if (x1>right) {
03668                 return(0);
03669         } 
03670         y2 = y + ry;
03671         top = dst->clip_rect.y;
03672         if (y2<top) {
03673                 return(0);
03674         } 
03675         y1 = y - ry;
03676         bottom = dst->clip_rect.y + dst->clip_rect.h - 1;
03677         if (y1>bottom) {
03678                 return(0);
03679         } 
03680 
03681         /*
03682         * Init vars 
03683         */
03684         oh = oi = oj = ok = 0xFFFF;
03685 
03686         /*
03687         * Draw 
03688         */
03689         result = 0;
03690 
03691         /* Lock surface */
03692         if (SDL_MUSTLOCK(dst)) {
03693                 if (SDL_LockSurface(dst) < 0) {
03694                         return (-1);
03695                 }
03696         }
03697 
03698         /*
03699         * Check alpha 
03700         */
03701         if ((color & 255) == 255) {
03702 
03703                 /*
03704                 * No Alpha - direct memory writes 
03705                 */
03706 
03707                 /*
03708                 * Setup color 
03709                 */
03710                 colorptr = (Uint8 *) & color;
03711                 if (SDL_BYTEORDER == SDL_BIG_ENDIAN) {
03712                         color = SDL_MapRGBA(dst->format, colorptr[0], colorptr[1], colorptr[2], colorptr[3]);
03713                 } else {
03714                         color = SDL_MapRGBA(dst->format, colorptr[3], colorptr[2], colorptr[1], colorptr[0]);
03715                 }
03716 
03717 
03718                 if (rx > ry) {
03719                         ix = 0;
03720                         iy = rx * 64;
03721 
03722                         do {
03723                                 h = (ix + 32) >> 6;
03724                                 i = (iy + 32) >> 6;
03725                                 j = (h * ry) / rx;
03726                                 k = (i * ry) / rx;
03727 
03728                                 if (((ok != k) && (oj != k)) || ((oj != j) && (ok != j)) || (k != j)) {
03729                                         xph = x + h;
03730                                         xmh = x - h;
03731                                         if (k > 0) {
03732                                                 ypk = y + k;
03733                                                 ymk = y - k;
03734                                                 result |= fastPixelColorNolock(dst, xmh, ypk, color);
03735                                                 result |= fastPixelColorNolock(dst, xph, ypk, color);
03736                                                 result |= fastPixelColorNolock(dst, xmh, ymk, color);
03737                                                 result |= fastPixelColorNolock(dst, xph, ymk, color);
03738                                         } else {
03739                                                 result |= fastPixelColorNolock(dst, xmh, y, color);
03740                                                 result |= fastPixelColorNolock(dst, xph, y, color);
03741                                         }
03742                                         ok = k;
03743                                         xpi = x + i;
03744                                         xmi = x - i;
03745                                         if (j > 0) {
03746                                                 ypj = y + j;
03747                                                 ymj = y - j;
03748                                                 result |= fastPixelColorNolock(dst, xmi, ypj, color);
03749                                                 result |= fastPixelColorNolock(dst, xpi, ypj, color);
03750                                                 result |= fastPixelColorNolock(dst, xmi, ymj, color);
03751                                                 result |= fastPixelColorNolock(dst, xpi, ymj, color);
03752                                         } else {
03753                                                 result |= fastPixelColorNolock(dst, xmi, y, color);
03754                                                 result |= fastPixelColorNolock(dst, xpi, y, color);
03755                                         }
03756                                         oj = j;
03757                                 }
03758 
03759                                 ix = ix + iy / rx;
03760                                 iy = iy - ix / rx;
03761 
03762                         } while (i > h);
03763                 } else {
03764                         ix = 0;
03765                         iy = ry * 64;
03766 
03767                         do {
03768                                 h = (ix + 32) >> 6;
03769                                 i = (iy + 32) >> 6;
03770                                 j = (h * rx) / ry;
03771                                 k = (i * rx) / ry;
03772 
03773                                 if (((oi != i) && (oh != i)) || ((oh != h) && (oi != h) && (i != h))) {
03774                                         xmj = x - j;
03775                                         xpj = x + j;
03776                                         if (i > 0) {
03777                                                 ypi = y + i;
03778                                                 ymi = y - i;
03779                                                 result |= fastPixelColorNolock(dst, xmj, ypi, color);
03780                                                 result |= fastPixelColorNolock(dst, xpj, ypi, color);
03781                                                 result |= fastPixelColorNolock(dst, xmj, ymi, color);
03782                                                 result |= fastPixelColorNolock(dst, xpj, ymi, color);
03783                                         } else {
03784                                                 result |= fastPixelColorNolock(dst, xmj, y, color);
03785                                                 result |= fastPixelColorNolock(dst, xpj, y, color);
03786                                         }
03787                                         oi = i;
03788                                         xmk = x - k;
03789                                         xpk = x + k;
03790                                         if (h > 0) {
03791                                                 yph = y + h;
03792                                                 ymh = y - h;
03793                                                 result |= fastPixelColorNolock(dst, xmk, yph, color);
03794                                                 result |= fastPixelColorNolock(dst, xpk, yph, color);
03795                                                 result |= fastPixelColorNolock(dst, xmk, ymh, color);
03796                                                 result |= fastPixelColorNolock(dst, xpk, ymh, color);
03797                                         } else {
03798                                                 result |= fastPixelColorNolock(dst, xmk, y, color);
03799                                                 result |= fastPixelColorNolock(dst, xpk, y, color);
03800                                         }
03801                                         oh = h;
03802                                 }
03803 
03804                                 ix = ix + iy / ry;
03805                                 iy = iy - ix / ry;
03806 
03807                         } while (i > h);
03808                 }
03809 
03810         } else {
03811 
03812                 if (rx > ry) {
03813                         ix = 0;
03814                         iy = rx * 64;
03815 
03816                         do {
03817                                 h = (ix + 32) >> 6;
03818                                 i = (iy + 32) >> 6;
03819                                 j = (h * ry) / rx;
03820                                 k = (i * ry) / rx;
03821 
03822                                 if (((ok != k) && (oj != k)) || ((oj != j) && (ok != j)) || (k != j)) {
03823                                         xph = x + h;
03824                                         xmh = x - h;
03825                                         if (k > 0) {
03826                                                 ypk = y + k;
03827                                                 ymk = y - k;
03828                                                 result |= pixelColorNolock (dst, xmh, ypk, color);
03829                                                 result |= pixelColorNolock (dst, xph, ypk, color);
03830                                                 result |= pixelColorNolock (dst, xmh, ymk, color);
03831                                                 result |= pixelColorNolock (dst, xph, ymk, color);
03832                                         } else {
03833                                                 result |= pixelColorNolock (dst, xmh, y, color);
03834                                                 result |= pixelColorNolock (dst, xph, y, color);
03835                                         }
03836                                         ok = k;
03837                                         xpi = x + i;
03838                                         xmi = x - i;
03839                                         if (j > 0) {
03840                                                 ypj = y + j;
03841                                                 ymj = y - j;
03842                                                 result |= pixelColorNolock (dst, xmi, ypj, color);
03843                                                 result |= pixelColorNolock (dst, xpi, ypj, color);
03844                                                 result |= pixelColorNolock (dst, xmi, ymj, color);
03845                                                 result |= pixelColor(dst, xpi, ymj, color);
03846                                         } else {
03847                                                 result |= pixelColorNolock (dst, xmi, y, color);
03848                                                 result |= pixelColorNolock (dst, xpi, y, color);
03849                                         }
03850                                         oj = j;
03851                                 }
03852 
03853                                 ix = ix + iy / rx;
03854                                 iy = iy - ix / rx;
03855 
03856                         } while (i > h);
03857                 } else {
03858                         ix = 0;
03859                         iy = ry * 64;
03860 
03861                         do {
03862                                 h = (ix + 32) >> 6;
03863                                 i = (iy + 32) >> 6;
03864                                 j = (h * rx) / ry;
03865                                 k = (i * rx) / ry;
03866 
03867                                 if (((oi != i) && (oh != i)) || ((oh != h) && (oi != h) && (i != h))) {
03868                                         xmj = x - j;
03869                                         xpj = x + j;
03870                                         if (i > 0) {
03871                                                 ypi = y + i;
03872                                                 ymi = y - i;
03873                                                 result |= pixelColorNolock (dst, xmj, ypi, color);
03874                                                 result |= pixelColorNolock (dst, xpj, ypi, color);
03875                                                 result |= pixelColorNolock (dst, xmj, ymi, color);
03876                                                 result |= pixelColorNolock (dst, xpj, ymi, color);
03877                                         } else {
03878                                                 result |= pixelColorNolock (dst, xmj, y, color);
03879                                                 result |= pixelColorNolock (dst, xpj, y, color);
03880                                         }
03881                                         oi = i;
03882                                         xmk = x - k;
03883                                         xpk = x + k;
03884                                         if (h > 0) {
03885                                                 yph = y + h;
03886                                                 ymh = y - h;
03887                                                 result |= pixelColorNolock (dst, xmk, yph, color);
03888                                                 result |= pixelColorNolock (dst, xpk, yph, color);
03889                                                 result |= pixelColorNolock (dst, xmk, ymh, color);
03890                                                 result |= pixelColorNolock (dst, xpk, ymh, color);
03891                                         } else {
03892                                                 result |= pixelColorNolock (dst, xmk, y, color);
03893                                                 result |= pixelColorNolock (dst, xpk, y, color);
03894                                         }
03895                                         oh = h;
03896                                 }
03897 
03898                                 ix = ix + iy / ry;
03899                                 iy = iy - ix / ry;
03900 
03901                         } while (i > h);
03902                 }
03903 
03904         }                               /* Alpha check */
03905 
03906         /* Unlock surface */
03907         if (SDL_MUSTLOCK(dst)) {
03908                 SDL_UnlockSurface(dst);
03909         }
03910 
03911         return (result);
03912 }
03913 
03929 int ellipseRGBA(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x, Sint16 y, Sint16 rx, Sint16 ry, Uint8 r, Uint8 g, Uint8 b, Uint8 a)
03930 {
03931         /*
03932         * Draw 
03933         */
03934         return (ellipseColor(dst, x, y, rx, ry, ((Uint32) r << 24) | ((Uint32) g << 16) | ((Uint32) b << 8) | (Uint32) a));
03935 }
03936 
03937 /* ----- AA Ellipse */
03938 
03939 /* Win32 does not have lrint, so provide a local inline version */
03940 /*  detect MinGW and Symbian and avoid function */
03941 /*  detect 64bit and use intrinsic version */
03942 #if (defined(WIN32) || defined(WIN64)) && !defined(__MINGW_H) && !defined(__SYMBIAN32__)
03943 #ifdef _M_X64
03944 #include <emmintrin.h>
03945 static __inline long 
03946 lrint(float f) 
03947 {
03948         return _mm_cvtss_si32(_mm_load_ss(&f));
03949 }
03950 #else
03951 __inline long int
03952 lrint (double flt)
03953 {       
03954         int intgr;
03955         _asm
03956         {
03957                 fld flt
03958                         fistp intgr
03959         };
03960         return intgr;
03961 }
03962 #endif
03963 #endif
03964 
03980 int aaellipseColor(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x, Sint16 y, Sint16 rx, Sint16 ry, Uint32 color)
03981 {
03982         Sint16 left, right, top, bottom;
03983         Sint16 x1,y1,x2,y2;
03984         int i;
03985         int a2, b2, ds, dt, dxt, t, s, d;
03986         Sint16 xp, yp, xs, ys, dyt, od, xx, yy, xc2, yc2;
03987         float cp;
03988         double sab;
03989         Uint8 weight, iweight;
03990         int result;
03991 
03992         /*
03993         * Check visibility of clipping rectangle
03994         */
03995         if ((dst->clip_rect.w==0) || (dst->clip_rect.h==0)) {
03996                 return(0);
03997         }
03998 
03999         /*
04000         * Sanity check radii 
04001         */
04002         if ((rx < 0) || (ry < 0)) {
04003                 return (-1);
04004         }
04005 
04006         /*
04007         * Special case for rx=0 - draw a vline 
04008         */
04009         if (rx == 0) {
04010                 return (vlineColor(dst, x, y - ry, y + ry, color));
04011         }
04012         /*
04013         * Special case for ry=0 - draw an hline 
04014         */
04015         if (ry == 0) {
04016                 return (hlineColor(dst, x - rx, x + rx, y, color));
04017         }
04018 
04019         /*
04020         * Get circle and clipping boundary and 
04021         * test if bounding box of circle is visible 
04022         */
04023         x2 = x + rx;
04024         left = dst->clip_rect.x;
04025         if (x2<left) {
04026                 return(0);
04027         } 
04028         x1 = x - rx;
04029         right = dst->clip_rect.x + dst->clip_rect.w - 1;
04030         if (x1>right) {
04031                 return(0);
04032         } 
04033         y2 = y + ry;
04034         top = dst->clip_rect.y;
04035         if (y2<top) {
04036                 return(0);
04037         } 
04038         y1 = y - ry;
04039         bottom = dst->clip_rect.y + dst->clip_rect.h - 1;
04040         if (y1>bottom) {
04041                 return(0);
04042         } 
04043 
04044         /* Variable setup */
04045         a2 = rx * rx;
04046         b2 = ry * ry;
04047 
04048         ds = 2 * a2;
04049         dt = 2 * b2;
04050 
04051         xc2 = 2 * x;
04052         yc2 = 2 * y;
04053 
04054         sab = sqrt(a2 + b2);
04055         od = (Sint16)lrint(sab*0.01) + 1; /* introduce some overdraw */
04056         dxt = (Sint16)lrint((double)a2 / sab) + od;
04057 
04058         t = 0;
04059         s = -2 * a2 * ry;
04060         d = 0;
04061 
04062         xp = x;
04063         yp = y - ry;
04064 
04065         /* Lock surface */
04066         if (SDL_MUSTLOCK(dst)) {
04067                 if (SDL_LockSurface(dst) < 0) {
04068                         return (-1);
04069                 }
04070         }
04071 
04072         /* Draw */
04073         result = 0;
04074 
04075         /* "End points" */
04076         result |= pixelColorNolock(dst, xp, yp, color);
04077         result |= pixelColorNolock(dst, xc2 - xp, yp, color);
04078         result |= pixelColorNolock(dst, xp, yc2 - yp, color);
04079         result |= pixelColorNolock(dst, xc2 - xp, yc2 - yp, color);
04080 
04081         for (i = 1; i <= dxt; i++) {
04082                 xp--;
04083                 d += t - b2;
04084 
04085                 if (d >= 0)
04086                         ys = yp - 1;
04087                 else if ((d - s - a2) > 0) {
04088                         if ((2 * d - s - a2) >= 0)
04089                                 ys = yp + 1;
04090                         else {
04091                                 ys = yp;
04092                                 yp++;
04093                                 d -= s + a2;
04094                                 s += ds;
04095                         }
04096                 } else {
04097                         yp++;
04098                         ys = yp + 1;
04099                         d -= s + a2;
04100                         s += ds;
04101                 }
04102 
04103                 t -= dt;
04104 
04105                 /* Calculate alpha */
04106                 if (s != 0.0) {
04107                         cp = (float) abs(d) / (float) abs(s);
04108                         if (cp > 1.0) {
04109                                 cp = 1.0;
04110                         }
04111                 } else {
04112                         cp = 1.0;
04113                 }
04114 
04115                 /* Calculate weights */
04116                 weight = (Uint8) (cp * 255);
04117                 iweight = 255 - weight;
04118 
04119                 /* Upper half */
04120                 xx = xc2 - xp;
04121                 result |= pixelColorWeightNolock(dst, xp, yp, color, iweight);
04122                 result |= pixelColorWeightNolock(dst, xx, yp, color, iweight);
04123 
04124                 result |= pixelColorWeightNolock(dst, xp, ys, color, weight);
04125                 result |= pixelColorWeightNolock(dst, xx, ys, color, weight);
04126 
04127                 /* Lower half */
04128                 yy = yc2 - yp;
04129                 result |= pixelColorWeightNolock(dst, xp, yy, color, iweight);
04130                 result |= pixelColorWeightNolock(dst, xx, yy, color, iweight);
04131 
04132                 yy = yc2 - ys;
04133                 result |= pixelColorWeightNolock(dst, xp, yy, color, weight);
04134                 result |= pixelColorWeightNolock(dst, xx, yy, color, weight);
04135         }
04136 
04137         /* Replaces original approximation code dyt = abs(yp - yc); */
04138         dyt = (Sint16)lrint((double)b2 / sab ) + od;    
04139 
04140         for (i = 1; i <= dyt; i++) {
04141                 yp++;
04142                 d -= s + a2;
04143 
04144                 if (d <= 0)
04145                         xs = xp + 1;
04146                 else if ((d + t - b2) < 0) {
04147                         if ((2 * d + t - b2) <= 0)
04148                                 xs = xp - 1;
04149                         else {
04150                                 xs = xp;
04151                                 xp--;
04152                                 d += t - b2;
04153                                 t -= dt;
04154                         }
04155                 } else {
04156                         xp--;
04157                         xs = xp - 1;
04158                         d += t - b2;
04159                         t -= dt;
04160                 }
04161 
04162                 s += ds;
04163 
04164                 /* Calculate alpha */
04165                 if (t != 0.0) {
04166                         cp = (float) abs(d) / (float) abs(t);
04167                         if (cp > 1.0) {
04168                                 cp = 1.0;
04169                         }
04170                 } else {
04171                         cp = 1.0;
04172                 }
04173 
04174                 /* Calculate weight */
04175                 weight = (Uint8) (cp * 255);
04176                 iweight = 255 - weight;
04177 
04178                 /* Left half */
04179                 xx = xc2 - xp;
04180                 yy = yc2 - yp;
04181                 result |= pixelColorWeightNolock(dst, xp, yp, color, iweight);
04182                 result |= pixelColorWeightNolock(dst, xx, yp, color, iweight);
04183 
04184                 result |= pixelColorWeightNolock(dst, xp, yy, color, iweight);
04185                 result |= pixelColorWeightNolock(dst, xx, yy, color, iweight);
04186 
04187                 /* Right half */
04188                 xx = xc2 - xs;
04189                 result |= pixelColorWeightNolock(dst, xs, yp, color, weight);
04190                 result |= pixelColorWeightNolock(dst, xx, yp, color, weight);
04191 
04192                 result |= pixelColorWeightNolock(dst, xs, yy, color, weight);
04193                 result |= pixelColorWeightNolock(dst, xx, yy, color, weight);
04194 
04195         }
04196 
04197         /* Unlock surface */
04198         if (SDL_MUSTLOCK(dst)) {
04199                 SDL_UnlockSurface(dst);
04200         }
04201 
04202         return (result);
04203 }
04204 
04220 int aaellipseRGBA(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x, Sint16 y, Sint16 rx, Sint16 ry, Uint8 r, Uint8 g, Uint8 b, Uint8 a)
04221 {
04222         /*
04223         * Draw 
04224         */
04225         return (aaellipseColor
04226                 (dst, x, y, rx, ry, ((Uint32) r << 24) | ((Uint32) g << 16) | ((Uint32) b << 8) | (Uint32) a));
04227 }
04228 
04229 /* ---- Filled Ellipse */
04230 
04231 /* Note: */
04232 /* Based on algorithm from sge library with multiple-hline draw removal */
04233 /* and other speedup changes. */
04234 
04250 int filledEllipseColor(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x, Sint16 y, Sint16 rx, Sint16 ry, Uint32 color)
04251 {
04252         Sint16 left, right, top, bottom;
04253         int result;
04254         Sint16 x1, y1, x2, y2;
04255         int ix, iy;
04256         int h, i, j, k;
04257         int oh, oi, oj, ok;
04258         int xmh, xph;
04259         int xmi, xpi;
04260         int xmj, xpj;
04261         int xmk, xpk;
04262 
04263         /*
04264         * Check visibility of clipping rectangle
04265         */
04266         if ((dst->clip_rect.w==0) || (dst->clip_rect.h==0)) {
04267                 return(0);
04268         }
04269 
04270         /*
04271         * Sanity check radii 
04272         */
04273         if ((rx < 0) || (ry < 0)) {
04274                 return (-1);
04275         }
04276 
04277         /*
04278         * Special case for rx=0 - draw a vline 
04279         */
04280         if (rx == 0) {
04281                 return (vlineColor(dst, x, y - ry, y + ry, color));
04282         }
04283         /*
04284         * Special case for ry=0 - draw a hline 
04285         */
04286         if (ry == 0) {
04287                 return (hlineColor(dst, x - rx, x + rx, y, color));
04288         }
04289 
04290         /*
04291         * Get circle and clipping boundary and 
04292         * test if bounding box of circle is visible 
04293         */
04294         x2 = x + rx;
04295         left = dst->clip_rect.x;
04296         if (x2<left) {
04297                 return(0);
04298         } 
04299         x1 = x - rx;
04300         right = dst->clip_rect.x + dst->clip_rect.w - 1;
04301         if (x1>right) {
04302                 return(0);
04303         } 
04304         y2 = y + ry;
04305         top = dst->clip_rect.y;
04306         if (y2<top) {
04307                 return(0);
04308         } 
04309         y1 = y - ry;
04310         bottom = dst->clip_rect.y + dst->clip_rect.h - 1;
04311         if (y1>bottom) {
04312                 return(0);
04313         } 
04314 
04315         /*
04316         * Init vars 
04317         */
04318         oh = oi = oj = ok = 0xFFFF;
04319 
04320         /*
04321         * Draw 
04322         */
04323         result = 0;
04324         if (rx > ry) {
04325                 ix = 0;
04326                 iy = rx * 64;
04327 
04328                 do {
04329                         h = (ix + 32) >> 6;
04330                         i = (iy + 32) >> 6;
04331                         j = (h * ry) / rx;
04332                         k = (i * ry) / rx;
04333 
04334                         if ((ok != k) && (oj != k)) {
04335                                 xph = x + h;
04336                                 xmh = x - h;
04337                                 if (k > 0) {
04338                                         result |= hlineColor(dst, xmh, xph, y + k, color);
04339                                         result |= hlineColor(dst, xmh, xph, y - k, color);
04340                                 } else {
04341                                         result |= hlineColor(dst, xmh, xph, y, color);
04342                                 }
04343                                 ok = k;
04344                         }
04345                         if ((oj != j) && (ok != j) && (k != j)) {
04346                                 xmi = x - i;
04347                                 xpi = x + i;
04348                                 if (j > 0) {
04349                                         result |= hlineColor(dst, xmi, xpi, y + j, color);
04350                                         result |= hlineColor(dst, xmi, xpi, y - j, color);
04351                                 } else {
04352                                         result |= hlineColor(dst, xmi, xpi, y, color);
04353                                 }
04354                                 oj = j;
04355                         }
04356 
04357                         ix = ix + iy / rx;
04358                         iy = iy - ix / rx;
04359 
04360                 } while (i > h);
04361         } else {
04362                 ix = 0;
04363                 iy = ry * 64;
04364 
04365                 do {
04366                         h = (ix + 32) >> 6;
04367                         i = (iy + 32) >> 6;
04368                         j = (h * rx) / ry;
04369                         k = (i * rx) / ry;
04370 
04371                         if ((oi != i) && (oh != i)) {
04372                                 xmj = x - j;
04373                                 xpj = x + j;
04374                                 if (i > 0) {
04375                                         result |= hlineColor(dst, xmj, xpj, y + i, color);
04376                                         result |= hlineColor(dst, xmj, xpj, y - i, color);
04377                                 } else {
04378                                         result |= hlineColor(dst, xmj, xpj, y, color);
04379                                 }
04380                                 oi = i;
04381                         }
04382                         if ((oh != h) && (oi != h) && (i != h)) {
04383                                 xmk = x - k;
04384                                 xpk = x + k;
04385                                 if (h > 0) {
04386                                         result |= hlineColor(dst, xmk, xpk, y + h, color);
04387                                         result |= hlineColor(dst, xmk, xpk, y - h, color);
04388                                 } else {
04389                                         result |= hlineColor(dst, xmk, xpk, y, color);
04390                                 }
04391                                 oh = h;
04392                         }
04393 
04394                         ix = ix + iy / ry;
04395                         iy = iy - ix / ry;
04396 
04397                 } while (i > h);
04398         }
04399 
04400         return (result);
04401 }
04402 
04418 int filledEllipseRGBA(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x, Sint16 y, Sint16 rx, Sint16 ry, Uint8 r, Uint8 g, Uint8 b, Uint8 a)
04419 {
04420         /*
04421         * Draw 
04422         */
04423         return (filledEllipseColor
04424                 (dst, x, y, rx, ry, ((Uint32) r << 24) | ((Uint32) g << 16) | ((Uint32) b << 8) | (Uint32) a));
04425 }
04426 
04427 /* ----- pie */
04428 
04445 int _pieColor(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x, Sint16 y, Sint16 rad, Sint16 start, Sint16 end, Uint32 color, Uint8 filled)
04446 {
04447         Sint16 left, right, top, bottom;
04448         Sint16 x1, y1, x2, y2;
04449         int result;
04450         double angle, start_angle, end_angle;
04451         double deltaAngle;
04452         double dr;
04453         int posX, posY;
04454         int numpoints, i;
04455         Sint16 *vx, *vy;
04456 
04457         /*
04458         * Check visibility of clipping rectangle
04459         */
04460         if ((dst->clip_rect.w==0) || (dst->clip_rect.h==0)) {
04461                 return(0);
04462         }
04463 
04464         /*
04465         * Sanity check radii 
04466         */
04467         if (rad < 0) {
04468                 return (-1);
04469         }
04470 
04471         /*
04472         * Fixup angles
04473         */
04474         start = start % 360;
04475         end = end % 360;
04476 
04477         /*
04478         * Special case for rad=0 - draw a point 
04479         */
04480         if (rad == 0) {
04481                 return (pixelColor(dst, x, y, color));
04482         }
04483 
04484         /*
04485         * Clip against circle, not pie (not 100% optimal).
04486         * Get pie's circle and clipping boundary and 
04487         * test if bounding box of circle is visible
04488         */
04489         x2 = x + rad;
04490         left = dst->clip_rect.x;
04491         if (x2<left) {
04492                 return(0);
04493         } 
04494         x1 = x - rad;
04495         right = dst->clip_rect.x + dst->clip_rect.w - 1;
04496         if (x1>right) {
04497                 return(0);
04498         } 
04499         y2 = y + rad;
04500         top = dst->clip_rect.y;
04501         if (y2<top) {
04502                 return(0);
04503         } 
04504         y1 = y - rad;
04505         bottom = dst->clip_rect.y + dst->clip_rect.h - 1;
04506         if (y1>bottom) {
04507                 return(0);
04508         } 
04509 
04510         /*
04511         * Variable setup 
04512         */
04513         dr = (double) rad;
04514         deltaAngle = 3.0 / dr;
04515         start_angle = (double) start *(2.0 * M_PI / 360.0);
04516         end_angle = (double) end *(2.0 * M_PI / 360.0);
04517         if (start > end) {
04518                 end_angle += (2.0 * M_PI);
04519         }
04520 
04521         /* We will always have at least 2 points */
04522         numpoints = 2;
04523 
04524         /* Count points (rather than calculating it) */
04525         angle = start_angle;
04526         while (angle < end_angle) {
04527                 angle += deltaAngle;
04528                 numpoints++;
04529         }
04530 
04531         /* Allocate combined vertex array */
04532         vx = vy = (Sint16 *) malloc(2 * sizeof(Uint16) * numpoints);
04533         if (vx == NULL) {
04534                 return (-1);
04535         }
04536 
04537         /* Update point to start of vy */
04538         vy += numpoints;
04539 
04540         /* Center */
04541         vx[0] = x;
04542         vy[0] = y;
04543 
04544         /* First vertex */
04545         angle = start_angle;
04546         vx[1] = x + (int) (dr * cos(angle));
04547         vy[1] = y + (int) (dr * sin(angle));
04548 
04549         if (numpoints<3)
04550         {
04551                 result = lineColor(dst, vx[0], vy[0], vx[1], vy[1], numpoints, color);
04552         }
04553         else
04554         {
04555                 /* Calculate other vertices */
04556                 i = 2;
04557                 angle = start_angle;
04558                 while (angle < end_angle) {
04559                         angle += deltaAngle;
04560                         if (angle>end_angle)
04561                         {
04562                                 angle = end_angle;
04563                         }
04564                         vx[i] = x + (int) (dr * cos(angle));
04565                         vy[i] = y + (int) (dr * sin(angle));
04566                         i++;
04567                 }
04568 
04569                 /* Draw */
04570                 if (filled) {
04571                         result = filledPolygonColor(dst, vx, vy, numpoints, color);
04572                 } else {
04573                         result = polygonColor(dst, vx, vy, numpoints, color);
04574                 }
04575         }
04576 
04577         /* Free combined vertex array */
04578         free(vx);
04579 
04580         return (result);
04581 }
04582 
04596 int pieColor(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x, Sint16 y, Sint16 rad, 
04597                          Sint16 start, Sint16 end, Uint32 color) 
04598 {
04599         return (_pieColor(dst, x, y, rad, start, end, color, 0));
04600 
04601 }
04602 
04619 int pieRGBA(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x, Sint16 y, Sint16 rad,
04620                         Sint16 start, Sint16 end, Uint8 r, Uint8 g, Uint8 b, Uint8 a)
04621 {
04622         return (_pieColor(dst, x, y, rad, start, end,
04623                 ((Uint32) r << 24) | ((Uint32) g << 16) | ((Uint32) b << 8) | (Uint32) a, 0));
04624 
04625 }
04626 
04640 int filledPieColor(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x, Sint16 y, Sint16 rad, Sint16 start, Sint16 end, Uint32 color)
04641 {
04642         return (_pieColor(dst, x, y, rad, start, end, color, 1));

04661 int filledPieRGBA(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x, Sint16 y, Sint16 rad,
04662                                   Sint16 start, Sint16 end, Uint8 r, Uint8 g, Uint8 b, Uint8 a)
04663 {

04665                 ((Uint32) r << 24) | ((Uint32) g << 16) | ((Uint32) b << 8) | (Uint32) a, 1));
04666 }

04669 
04686 int trigonColor(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x1, Sint16 y1, Sint16 x2, Sint16 y2, Sint16 x3, Sint16 y3, Uint32 color)
04687 {
04688         Sint16 vx[3]; 
04689         Sint16 vy[3];
04690 
04691         vx[0]=x1;
04692         vx[1]=x2;
04693         vx[2]=x3;
04694         vy[0]=y1;
04695         vy[1]=y2;
04696         vy[2]=y3;
04697 
04698         return(polygonColor(dst,vx,vy,3,color));
04699 }

04832 
04852 int filledTrigonRGBA(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x1, Sint16 y1, Sint16 x2, Sint16 y2, Sint16 x3, Sint16 y3,
04853                                          Uint8 r, Uint8 g, Uint8 b, Uint8 a)
04854 {
04855         Sint16 vx[3]; 
04856         Sint16 vy[3];
04857 
04858         vx[0]=x1;
04859         vx[1]=x2;
04860         vx[2]=x3;
04861         vy[0]=y1;
04862         vy[1]=y2;
04863         vy[2]=y3;
04864 
04865         return(filledPolygonRGBA(dst,vx,vy,3,r,g,b,a));
04866 }
04867 
04868 /* ---- Polygon */
04869 
04881 int polygonColor(SDL_Surface * dst, const Sint16 * vx, const Sint16 * vy, int n, Uint32 color)
04882 {
04883         int result;
04884         int i;
04885         const Sint16 *x1, *y1, *x2, *y2;
04886 
04887         /*
04888         * Check visibility of clipping rectangle
04889         */
04890         if ((dst->clip_rect.w==0) || (dst->clip_rect.h==0)) {
04891                 return(0);
04892         }
04893 
04894         /*
04895         * Vertex array NULL check 
04896         */
04897         if (vx == NULL) {
04898                 return (-1);
04899         }
04900         if (vy == NULL) {
04901                 return (-1);
04902         }
04903 
04904         /*
04905         * Sanity check 
04906         */
04907         if (n < 3) {
04908                 return (-1);
04909         }
04910 
04911         /*
04912         * Pointer setup 
04913         */
04914         x1 = x2 = vx;
04915         y1 = y2 = vy;
04916         x2++;
04917         y2++;
04918 
04919         /*
04920         * Draw 
04921         */
04922         result = 0;
04923         for (i = 1; i < n; i++) {
04924                 result |= lineColor(dst, *x1, *y1, *x2, *y2, color);
04925                 x1 = x2;
04926                 y1 = y2;
04927                 x2++;
04928                 y2++;
04929         }
04930         result |= lineColor(dst, *x1, *y1, *vx, *vy, color);
04931 
04932         return (result);
04933 }
04934 
04949 int polygonRGBA(SDL_Surface * dst, const Sint16 * vx, const Sint16 * vy, int n, Uint8 r, Uint8 g, Uint8 b, Uint8 a)
04950 {
04951         /*
04952         * Draw 
04953         */
04954         return (polygonColor(dst, vx, vy, n, ((Uint32) r << 24) | ((Uint32) g << 16) | ((Uint32) b << 8) | (Uint32) a));
04955 }
04956 
04957 /* ---- AA-Polygon */
04958 
04970 int aapolygonColor(SDL_Surface * dst, const Sint16 * vx, const Sint16 * vy, int n, Uint32 color)
04971 {
04972         int result;
04973         int i;
04974         const Sint16 *x1, *y1, *x2, *y2;
04975 
04976         /*
04977         * Check visibility of clipping rectangle
04978         */
04979         if ((dst->clip_rect.w==0) || (dst->clip_rect.h==0)) {
04980                 return(0);
04981         }
04982 
04983         /*
04984         * Vertex array NULL check 
04985         */
04986         if (vx == NULL) {
04987                 return (-1);
04988         }
04989         if (vy == NULL) {
04990                 return (-1);
04991         }
04992 
04993         /*
04994         * Sanity check 
04995         */
04996         if (n < 3) {
04997                 return (-1);
04998         }
04999 
05000         /*
05001         * Pointer setup 
05002         */
05003         x1 = x2 = vx;
05004         y1 = y2 = vy;
05005         x2++;
05006         y2++;
05007 
05008         /*
05009         * Draw 
05010         */
05011         result = 0;
05012         for (i = 1; i < n; i++) {

05014                 x1 = x2;
05015                 y1 = y2;
05016                 x2++;
05017                 y2++;
05018         }
05019         result |= _aalineColor(dst, *x1, *y1, *vx, *vy, color, 0);
05020

05038 int aapolygonRGBA(SDL_Surface * dst, const Sint16 * vx, const Sint16 * vy, int n, Uint8 r, Uint8 g, Uint8 b, Uint8 a)
05039 {

05041         * Draw
