05045 
05046 /* ---- Filled Polygon */
05047 
05056 int _gfxPrimitivesCompareInt(const void *a, const void *b)
05057 {
05058         return (*(const int *) a) - (*(const int *) b);
05059 }
05060 
05066 static int *gfxPrimitivesPolyIntsGlobal = NULL;
05067 
05073 static int gfxPrimitivesPolyAllocatedGlobal = 0;
05074 
05090 int filledPolygonColorMT(SDL_Surface * dst, const Sint16 * vx, const Sint16 * vy, int n, Uint32 color, int **polyInts, int *polyAllocated)
05091 {
05092         int result;
05093         int i;
05094         int y, xa, xb;
05095         int miny, maxy;
05096         int x1, y1;
05097         int x2, y2;
05098         int ind1, ind2;
05099         int ints;
05100         int *gfxPrimitivesPolyInts = NULL;
05101         int gfxPrimitivesPolyAllocated = 0;
05102 
05103         /*
05104         * Check visibility of clipping rectangle
05105         */
05106         if ((dst->clip_rect.w==0) || (dst->clip_rect.h==0)) {
05107                 return(0);
05108         }
05109 
05110         /*
05111         * Vertex array NULL check 
05112         */
05113         if (vx == NULL) {
05114                 return (-1);
05115         }
05116         if (vy == NULL) {
05117                 return (-1);
05118         }
05119 
05120         /*
05121         * Sanity check number of edges
05122         */
05123         if (n < 3) {
05124                 return -1;
05125         }
05126 
05127         /*
05128         * Map polygon cache  
05129         */
05130         if ((polyInts==NULL) || (polyAllocated==NULL)) {
05131                 /* Use global cache */
05132                 gfxPrimitivesPolyInts = gfxPrimitivesPolyIntsGlobal;
05133                 gfxPrimitivesPolyAllocated = gfxPrimitivesPolyAllocatedGlobal;
05134         } else {
05135                 /* Use local cache */
05136                 gfxPrimitivesPolyInts = *polyInts;
05137                 gfxPrimitivesPolyAllocated = *polyAllocated;
05138         }
05139 
05140         /*
05141         * Allocate temp array, only grow array 
05142         */
05143         if (!gfxPrimitivesPolyAllocated) {
05144                 gfxPrimitivesPolyInts = (int *) malloc(sizeof(int) * n);
05145                 gfxPrimitivesPolyAllocated = n;
05146         } else {
05147                 if (gfxPrimitivesPolyAllocated < n) {
05148                         gfxPrimitivesPolyInts = (int *) realloc(gfxPrimitivesPolyInts, sizeof(int) * n);
05149                         gfxPrimitivesPolyAllocated = n;
05150                 }
05151         }
05152 
05153         /*
05154         * Check temp array
05155         */
05156         if (gfxPrimitivesPolyInts==NULL) {        
05157                 gfxPrimitivesPolyAllocated = 0;
05158         }
05159 
05160         /*
05161         * Update cache variables
05162         */
05163         if ((polyInts==NULL) || (polyAllocated==NULL)) { 
05164                 gfxPrimitivesPolyIntsGlobal =  gfxPrimitivesPolyInts;
05165                 gfxPrimitivesPolyAllocatedGlobal = gfxPrimitivesPolyAllocated;
05166         } else {
05167                 *polyInts = gfxPrimitivesPolyInts;
05168                 *polyAllocated = gfxPrimitivesPolyAllocated;
05169         }
05170 
05171         /*
05172         * Check temp array again
05173         */
05174         if (gfxPrimitivesPolyInts==NULL) {        
05175                 return(-1);
05176         }
05177 
05178         /*
05179         * Determine Y maxima 
05180         */
05181         miny = vy[0];
05182         maxy = vy[0];
05183         for (i = 1; (i < n); i++) {
05184                 if (vy[i] < miny) {
05185                         miny = vy[i];
05186                 } else if (vy[i] > maxy) {
05187                         maxy = vy[i];
05188                 }
05189         }
05190 
05191         /*
05192         * Draw, scanning y 
05193         */
05194         result = 0;
05195         for (y = miny; (y <= maxy); y++) {
05196                 ints = 0;
05197                 for (i = 0; (i < n); i++) {
05198                         if (!i) {
05199                                 ind1 = n - 1;
05200                                 ind2 = 0;
05201                         } else {
05202                                 ind1 = i - 1;
05203                                 ind2 = i;
05204                         }
05205                         y1 = vy[ind1];
05206                         y2 = vy[ind2];
05207                         if (y1 < y2) {
05208                                 x1 = vx[ind1];
05209                                 x2 = vx[ind2];
05210                         } else if (y1 > y2) {
05211                                 y2 = vy[ind1];
05212                                 y1 = vy[ind2];
05213                                 x2 = vx[ind1];
05214                                 x1 = vx[ind2];
05215                         } else {
05216                                 continue;
05217                         }
05218                         if ( ((y >= y1) && (y < y2)) || ((y == maxy) && (y > y1) && (y <= y2)) ) {
05219                                 gfxPrimitivesPolyInts[ints++] = ((65536 * (y - y1)) / (y2 - y1)) * (x2 - x1) + (65536 * x1);
05220                         }           
05221                 }
05222 
05223                 qsort(gfxPrimitivesPolyInts, ints, sizeof(int), _gfxPrimitivesCompareInt);
05224 
05225                 for (i = 0; (i < ints); i += 2) {
05226                         xa = gfxPrimitivesPolyInts[i] + 1;
05227                         xa = (xa >> 16) + ((xa & 32768) >> 15);
05228                         xb = gfxPrimitivesPolyInts[i+1] - 1;
05229                         xb = (xb >> 16) + ((xb & 32768) >> 15);
05230                         result |= hlineColor(dst, xa, xb, y, color);
05231                 }
05232         }
05233 
05234         return (result);
05235 }
05236 
05255 int filledPolygonRGBAMT(SDL_Surface * dst, const Sint16 * vx, const Sint16 * vy, int n, Uint8 r, Uint8 g, Uint8 b, Uint8 a, int **polyInts, int *polyAllocated)
05256 {
05257         /*
05258         * Draw 
05259         */
05260         return (filledPolygonColorMT(dst, vx, vy, n, ((Uint32) r << 24) | ((Uint32) g << 16) | ((Uint32) b << 8) | (Uint32) a, polyInts, polyAllocated));
05261 }
05262 
05277 int filledPolygonColor(SDL_Surface * dst, const Sint16 * vx, const Sint16 * vy, int n, Uint32 color)
05278 {
05279         /*
05280         * Draw 
05281         */
05282         return (filledPolygonColorMT(dst, vx, vy, n, color, NULL, NULL));
05283 }
05284 
05299 int filledPolygonRGBA(SDL_Surface * dst, const Sint16 * vx, const Sint16 * vy, int n, Uint8 r, Uint8 g, Uint8 b, Uint8 a)
05300 {
05301         /*
05302         * Draw 
05303         */
05304         return (filledPolygonColorMT(dst, vx, vy, n, ((Uint32) r << 24) | ((Uint32) g << 16) | ((Uint32) b << 8) | (Uint32) a, NULL, NULL));
05305 }
05306 
05320 int _HLineTextured(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x1, Sint16 x2, Sint16 y, SDL_Surface *texture, int texture_dx, int texture_dy)
05321 {
05322         Sint16 left, right, top, bottom;
05323         Sint16 w;
05324         Sint16 xtmp;
05325         int result = 0;
05326         int texture_x_walker;    
05327         int texture_y_start;    
05328         SDL_Rect source_rect,dst_rect;
05329         int pixels_written,write_width;
05330 
05331         /*
05332         * Check visibility of clipping rectangle
05333         */
05334         if ((dst->clip_rect.w==0) || (dst->clip_rect.h==0)) {
05335                 return(0);
05336         }
05337 
05338         /*
05339         * Swap x1, x2 if required to ensure x1<=x2
05340         */
05341         if (x1 > x2) {
05342                 xtmp = x1;
05343                 x1 = x2;
05344                 x2 = xtmp;
05345         }
05346 
05347         /*
05348         * Get clipping boundary and
05349         * check visibility of hline 
05350         */
05351         left = dst->clip_rect.x;
05352         if (x2<left) {
05353                 return(0);
05354         }
05355         right = dst->clip_rect.x + dst->clip_rect.w - 1;
05356         if (x1>right) {
05357                 return(0);
05358         }
05359         top = dst->clip_rect.y;
05360         bottom = dst->clip_rect.y + dst->clip_rect.h - 1;
05361         if ((y<top) || (y>bottom)) {
05362                 return (0);
05363         }
05364 
05365         /*
05366         * Clip x 
05367         */
05368         if (x1 < left) {
05369                 x1 = left;
05370         }
05371         if (x2 > right) {
05372                 x2 = right;
05373         }
05374 
05375         /*
05376         * Calculate width to draw
05377         */
05378         w = x2 - x1 + 1;
05379 
05380         /*
05381         * Determine where in the texture we start drawing
05382         */
05383         texture_x_walker =   (x1 - texture_dx)  % texture->w;
05384         if (texture_x_walker < 0){
05385                 texture_x_walker = texture->w + texture_x_walker ;
05386         }
05387 
05388         texture_y_start = (y + texture_dy) % texture->h;
05389         if (texture_y_start < 0){
05390                 texture_y_start = texture->h + texture_y_start;
05391         }
05392 
05393         // setup the source rectangle; we are only drawing one horizontal line
05394         source_rect.y = texture_y_start;
05395         source_rect.x = texture_x_walker;
05396         source_rect.h = 1;
05397 
05398         // we will draw to the current y
05399         dst_rect.y = y;
05400 
05401         // if there are enough pixels left in the current row of the texture
05402         // draw it all at once
05403         if (w <= texture->w -texture_x_walker){
05404                 source_rect.w = w;
05405                 source_rect.x = texture_x_walker;
05406                 dst_rect.x= x1;
05407                 result = (SDL_BlitSurface  (texture, &source_rect , dst, &dst_rect) == 0);
05408         } else { // we need to draw multiple times
05409                 // draw the first segment
05410                 pixels_written = texture->w  - texture_x_walker;
05411                 source_rect.w = pixels_written;
05412                 source_rect.x = texture_x_walker;
05413                 dst_rect.x= x1;
05414                 result |= (SDL_BlitSurface (texture, &source_rect , dst, &dst_rect) == 0);
05415                 write_width = texture->w;
05416 
05417                 // now draw the rest
05418                 // set the source x to 0
05419                 source_rect.x = 0;
05420                 while (pixels_written < w){
05421                         if (write_width >= w - pixels_written) {
05422                                 write_width =  w - pixels_written;
05423                         }
05424                         source_rect.w = write_width;
05425                         dst_rect.x = x1 + pixels_written;
05426                         result  |= (SDL_BlitSurface  (texture,&source_rect , dst, &dst_rect) == 0);
05427                         pixels_written += write_width;
05428                 }
05429         }
05430 
05431         return result;
05432 }
05433 
05457 int texturedPolygonMT(SDL_Surface * dst, const Sint16 * vx, const Sint16 * vy, int n, 
05458                                           SDL_Surface * texture, int texture_dx, int texture_dy, int **polyInts, int *polyAllocated)
05459 {
05460         int result;
05461         int i;
05462         int y, xa, xb;
05463         int minx,maxx,miny, maxy;
05464         int x1, y1;
05465         int x2, y2;
05466         int ind1, ind2;
05467         int ints;
05468         int *gfxPrimitivesPolyInts = NULL;
05469         int gfxPrimitivesPolyAllocated = 0;
05470 
05471         /*
05472         * Check visibility of clipping rectangle
05473         */
05474         if ((dst->clip_rect.w==0) || (dst->clip_rect.h==0)) {
05475                 return(0);
05476         }
05477 
05478         /*
05479         * Sanity check number of edges
05480         */
05481         if (n < 3) {
05482                 return -1;
05483         }
05484 
05485         /*
05486         * Map polygon cache  
05487         */
05488         if ((polyInts==NULL) || (polyAllocated==NULL)) {
05489                 /* Use global cache */
05490                 gfxPrimitivesPolyInts = gfxPrimitivesPolyIntsGlobal;
05491                 gfxPrimitivesPolyAllocated = gfxPrimitivesPolyAllocatedGlobal;
05492         } else {
05493                 /* Use local cache */
05494                 gfxPrimitivesPolyInts = *polyInts;
05495                 gfxPrimitivesPolyAllocated = *polyAllocated;
05496         }
05497 
05498         /*
05499         * Allocate temp array, only grow array 
05500         */
05501         if (!gfxPrimitivesPolyAllocated) {
05502                 gfxPrimitivesPolyInts = (int *) malloc(sizeof(int) * n);
05503                 gfxPrimitivesPolyAllocated = n;
05504         } else {
05505                 if (gfxPrimitivesPolyAllocated < n) {
05506                         gfxPrimitivesPolyInts = (int *) realloc(gfxPrimitivesPolyInts, sizeof(int) * n);
05507                         gfxPrimitivesPolyAllocated = n;
05508                 }
05509         }
05510 
05511         /*
05512         * Check temp array
05513         */
05514         if (gfxPrimitivesPolyInts==NULL) {        
05515                 gfxPrimitivesPolyAllocated = 0;
05516         }
05517 
05518         /*
05519         * Update cache variables
05520         */
05521         if ((polyInts==NULL) || (polyAllocated==NULL)) { 
05522                 gfxPrimitivesPolyIntsGlobal =  gfxPrimitivesPolyInts;
05523                 gfxPrimitivesPolyAllocatedGlobal = gfxPrimitivesPolyAllocated;
05524         } else {
05525                 *polyInts = gfxPrimitivesPolyInts;
05526                 *polyAllocated = gfxPrimitivesPolyAllocated;
05527         }
05528 
05529         /*
05530         * Check temp array again
05531         */
05532         if (gfxPrimitivesPolyInts==NULL) {        
05533                 return(-1);
05534         }
05535 
05536         /*
05537         * Determine X,Y minima,maxima 
05538         */
05539         miny = vy[0];
05540         maxy = vy[0];
05541         minx = vx[0];
05542         maxx = vx[0];
05543         for (i = 1; (i < n); i++) {
05544                 if (vy[i] < miny) {
05545                         miny = vy[i];
05546                 } else if (vy[i] > maxy) {
05547                         maxy = vy[i];
05548                 }
05549                 if (vx[i] < minx) {
05550                         minx = vx[i];
05551                 } else if (vx[i] > maxx) {
05552                         maxx = vx[i];
05553                 }
05554         }
05555         if (maxx <0 || minx > dst->w){
05556                 return -1;
05557         }
05558         if (maxy <0 || miny > dst->h){
05559                 return -1;
05560         }
05561 
05562         /*
05563         * Draw, scanning y 
05564         */
05565         result = 0;
05566         for (y = miny; (y <= maxy); y++) {
05567                 ints = 0;
05568                 for (i = 0; (i < n); i++) {
05569                         if (!i) {
05570                                 ind1 = n - 1;
05571                                 ind2 = 0;
05572                         } else {
05573                                 ind1 = i - 1;
05574                                 ind2 = i;
05575                         }
05576                         y1 = vy[ind1];
05577                         y2 = vy[ind2];
05578                         if (y1 < y2) {
05579                                 x1 = vx[ind1];
05580                                 x2 = vx[ind2];
05581                         } else if (y1 > y2) {
05582                                 y2 = vy[ind1];
05583                                 y1 = vy[ind2];
05584                                 x2 = vx[ind1];
05585                                 x1 = vx[ind2];
05586                         } else {
05587                                 continue;
05588                         }
05589                         if ( ((y >= y1) && (y < y2)) || ((y == maxy) && (y > y1) && (y <= y2)) ) {
05590                                 gfxPrimitivesPolyInts[ints++] = ((65536 * (y - y1)) / (y2 - y1)) * (x2 - x1) + (65536 * x1);
05591                         } 
05592                 }
05593 
05594                 qsort(gfxPrimitivesPolyInts, ints, sizeof(int), _gfxPrimitivesCompareInt);
05595 
05596                 for (i = 0; (i < ints); i += 2) {
05597                         xa = gfxPrimitivesPolyInts[i] + 1;
05598                         xa = (xa >> 16) + ((xa & 32768) >> 15);
05599                         xb = gfxPrimitivesPolyInts[i+1] - 1;
05600                         xb = (xb >> 16) + ((xb & 32768) >> 15);
05601                         result |= _HLineTextured(dst, xa, xb, y, texture, texture_dx, texture_dy);
05602                 }
05603         }
05604 
05605         return (result);
05606 }
05607 
05624 int texturedPolygon(SDL_Surface * dst, const Sint16 * vx, const Sint16 * vy, int n, SDL_Surface *texture, int texture_dx, int texture_dy)
05625 {
05626         /*
05627         * Draw
05628         */
05629         return (texturedPolygonMT(dst, vx, vy, n, texture, texture_dx, texture_dy, NULL, NULL));
05630 }
05631 
05632 
05633 /* ---- Character */
05634 
05638 static SDL_Surface *gfxPrimitivesFont[256];
05639 
05643 static Uint32 gfxPrimitivesFontColor[256];
05644 
05648 static const unsigned char *currentFontdata = gfxPrimitivesFontdata;
05649 
05653 static Uint32 charWidth = 8;
05654 
05658 static Uint32 charHeight = 8;
05659 
05663 static Uint32 charWidthLocal = 8;
05664 
05668 static Uint32 charHeightLocal = 8;
05669 
05673 static Uint32 charPitch = 1;
05674 
05678 static Uint32 charRotation = 0;
05679 
05683 static Uint32 charSize = 8;
05684 
05698 void gfxPrimitivesSetFont(const void *fontdata, Uint32 cw, Uint32 ch)
05699 {
05700         int i;
05701 
05702         if ((fontdata) && (cw) && (ch)) {
05703                 currentFontdata = fontdata;
05704                 charWidth = cw;
05705                 charHeight = ch;
05706         } else {
05707                 currentFontdata = gfxPrimitivesFontdata;
05708                 charWidth = 8;
05709                 charHeight = 8;
05710         }
05711 
05712         charPitch = (charWidth+7)/8;
05713         charSize = charPitch * charHeight;
05714 
05715         /* Maybe flip width/height for rendering */
05716         if ((charRotation==1) || (charRotation==3))
05717         {
05718                 charWidthLocal = charHeight;
05719                 charHeightLocal = charWidth;
05720         }
05721         else
05722         {
05723                 charWidthLocal = charWidth;
05724                 charHeightLocal = charHeight;
05725         }
05726 
05727         /* Clear character cache */
05728         for (i = 0; i < 256; i++) {
05729                 if (gfxPrimitivesFont[i]) {
05730                         SDL_FreeSurface(gfxPrimitivesFont[i]);
05731                         gfxPrimitivesFont[i] = NULL;
05732                 }
05733         }
05734 }
05735 
05744 void gfxPrimitivesSetFontRotation(Uint32 rotation)
05745 {
05746         int i;
05747 
05748         rotation = rotation & 3;
05749         if (charRotation != rotation)
05750         {
05751                 /* Store rotation */
05752                 charRotation = rotation;
05753 
05754                 /* Maybe flip width/height for rendering */
05755                 if ((charRotation==1) || (charRotation==3))
05756                 {
05757                         charWidthLocal = charHeight;
05758                         charHeightLocal = charWidth;
05759                 }
05760                 else
05761                 {
05762                         charWidthLocal = charWidth;
05763                         charHeightLocal = charHeight;
05764                 }
05765 
05766                 /* Clear character cache */
05767                 for (i = 0; i < 256; i++) {
05768                         if (gfxPrimitivesFont[i]) {
05769                                 SDL_FreeSurface(gfxPrimitivesFont[i]);
05770                                 gfxPrimitivesFont[i] = NULL;
05771                         }
05772                 }
05773         }
05774 }
05775 
05791 int characterColor(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x, Sint16 y, char c, Uint32 color)
05792 {
05793         Sint16 left, right, top, bottom;
05794         Sint16 x1, y1, x2, y2;
05795         SDL_Rect srect;
05796         SDL_Rect drect;
05797         int result;
05798         Uint32 ix, iy;
05799         const unsigned char *charpos;
05800         Uint8 *curpos;
05801         int forced_redraw;
05802         Uint8 patt, mask;
05803         Uint8 *linepos;
05804         Uint32 pitch;
05805         SDL_Surface *rotatedCharacter;
05806         Uint32 ci;
05807 
05808         /*
05809         * Check visibility of clipping rectangle
05810         */
05811         if ((dst->clip_rect.w==0) || (dst->clip_rect.h==0)) {
05812                 return(0);
05813         }
05814 
05815         /*
05816         * Get text and clipping boundary and
05817         * test if bounding box of character is visible 
05818         */
05819 
05820         left = dst->clip_rect.x;
05821         x2 = x + charWidthLocal;
05822         if (x2<left) {
05823                 return(0);
05824         } 
05825         right = dst->clip_rect.x + dst->clip_rect.w - 1;
05826         x1 = x;
05827         if (x1>right) {
05828                 return(0);
05829         } 
05830         top = dst->clip_rect.y;
05831         y2 = y + charHeightLocal;
05832         if (y2<top) {
05833                 return(0);
05834         } 
05835         bottom = dst->clip_rect.y + dst->clip_rect.h - 1;
05836         y1 = y;
05837         if (y1>bottom) {
05838                 return(0);
05839         } 
05840 
05841         /*
05842         * Setup source rectangle
05843         */
05844         srect.x = 0;
05845         srect.y = 0;
05846         srect.w = charWidthLocal;
05847         srect.h = charHeightLocal;
05848 
05849         /*
05850         * Setup destination rectangle
05851         */
05852         drect.x = x;
05853         drect.y = y;
05854         drect.w = charWidthLocal;
05855         drect.h = charHeightLocal;
05856 
05857         /* Character index in cache */
05858         ci = (unsigned char) c;
05859 
05860         /*
05861         * Create new charWidth x charHeight bitmap surface if not already present.
05862         * Might get rotated later.
05863         */
05864         if (gfxPrimitivesFont[ci] == NULL) {
05865                 gfxPrimitivesFont[ci] =
05866                         SDL_CreateRGBSurface(SDL_SWSURFACE | SDL_HWSURFACE | SDL_SRCALPHA,
05867                         charWidth, charHeight, 32,
05868                         0xFF000000, 0x00FF0000, 0x0000FF00, 0x000000FF);
05869                 /*
05870                 * Check pointer 
05871                 */
05872                 if (gfxPrimitivesFont[ci] == NULL) {
05873                         return (-1);
05874                 }
05875                 /*
05876                 * Definitely redraw 
05877                 */
05878                 forced_redraw = 1;
05879         } else {
05880                 forced_redraw = 0;
05881         }
05882 
05883         /*
05884         * Check if color has changed 
05885         */
05886         if ((gfxPrimitivesFontColor[ci] != color) || (forced_redraw)) {
05887                 /*
05888                 * Redraw character 
05889                 */
05890                 SDL_SetAlpha(gfxPrimitivesFont[ci], SDL_SRCALPHA, 255);
05891                 gfxPrimitivesFontColor[ci] = color;
05892 
05893                 /* Lock font-surface */
05894                 if (SDL_LockSurface(gfxPrimitivesFont[ci]) != 0)
05895                         return (-1);
05896 
05897                 /*
05898                 * Variable setup 
05899                 */
05900                 charpos = currentFontdata + ci * charSize;
05901                 linepos = (Uint8 *) gfxPrimitivesFont[ci]->pixels;
05902                 pitch = gfxPrimitivesFont[ci]->pitch;
05903 
05904                 /*
05905                 * Drawing loop 
05906                 */
05907                 patt = 0;
05908                 for (iy = 0; iy < charHeight; iy++) {
05909                         mask = 0x00;
05910                         curpos = linepos;
05911                         for (ix = 0; ix < charWidth; ix++) {
05912                                 if (!(mask >>= 1)) {
05913                                         patt = *charpos++;
05914                                         mask = 0x80;
05915                                 }
05916 
05917                                 if (patt & mask)
05918                                         *(Uint32 *)curpos = color;
05919                                 else
05920                                         *(Uint32 *)curpos = 0;
05921                                 curpos += 4;
05922                         }
05923                         linepos += pitch;
05924                 }
05925 
05926                 /* Unlock font-surface */
05927                 SDL_UnlockSurface(gfxPrimitivesFont[ci]);
05928 
05929                 /* Maybe rotate and replace cached image */
05930                 if (charRotation>0)
05931                 {
05932                         rotatedCharacter = rotateSurface90Degrees(gfxPrimitivesFont[ci], charRotation);
05933                         SDL_FreeSurface(gfxPrimitivesFont[ci]);
05934                         gfxPrimitivesFont[ci] = rotatedCharacter;
05935                 }
05936         }
05937 
05938         /*
05939         * Draw bitmap onto destination surface 
05940         */
05941         result = SDL_BlitSurface(gfxPrimitivesFont[ci], &srect, dst, &drect);
05942 
05943         return (result);
05944 }
05945 
05960 int characterRGBA(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x, Sint16 y, char c, Uint8 r, Uint8 g, Uint8 b, Uint8 a)
05961 {
05962         /*
05963         * Draw 
05964         */
05965         return (characterColor(dst, x, y, c, ((Uint32) r << 24) | ((Uint32) g << 16) | ((Uint32) b << 8) | (Uint32) a));
05966 }
05967 
05982 int stringColor(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x, Sint16 y, const char *s, Uint32 color)
05983 {
05984         int result = 0;
05985         Sint16 curx = x;
05986         Sint16 cury = y;
05987         const char *curchar = s;
05988 
05989         while (*curchar && !result) {
05990                 result |= characterColor(dst, curx, cury, *curchar, color);
05991                 switch (charRotation)
05992                 {
05993                 case 0:
05994                         curx += charWidthLocal;
05995                         break;
05996                 case 2:
05997                         curx -= charWidthLocal;
05998                         break;
05999                 case 1:
06000                         cury += charHeightLocal;
06001                         break;
06002                 case 3:
06003                         cury -= charHeightLocal;
06004                         break;
06005                 }
06006                 curchar++;
06007         }
06008 
06009         return (result);
06010 }

06026 int stringRGBA(SDL_Surface * dst, Sint16 x, Sint16 y, const char *s, Uint8 r, Uint8 g, Uint8 b, Uint8 a)
06027 {
06028         /*
06029         * Draw 
06030         */
06031         return (stringColor(dst, x, y, s, ((Uint32) r << 24) | ((Uint32) g << 16) | ((Uint32) b << 8) | (Uint32) a));
06032 }
06033 
06034 /* ---- Bezier curve */
06035 
06045 double _evaluateBezier (double *data, int ndata, double t) 
06046 {
06047         double mu, result;
06048         int n,k,kn,nn,nkn;
06049         double blend,muk,munk;
06050 
06051         /* Sanity check bounds */
06052         if (t<0.0) {
06053                 return(data[0]);
06054         }
06055         if (t>=(double)ndata) {
06056                 return(data[ndata-1]);
06057         }
06058 
06059         /* Adjust t to the range 0.0 to 1.0 */ 
06060         mu=t/(double)ndata;
06061 
06062         /* Calculate interpolate */
06063         n=ndata-1;
06064         result=0.0;
06065         muk = 1;
06066         munk = pow(1-mu,(double)n);
06067         for (k=0;k<=n;k++) {
06068                 nn = n;
06069                 kn = k;
06070                 nkn = n - k;
06071                 blend = muk * munk;
06072                 muk *= mu;
06073                 munk /= (1-mu);
06074                 while (nn >= 1) {
06075                         blend *= nn;
06076                         nn--;
06077                         if (kn > 1) {
06078                                 blend /= (double)kn;
06079                                 kn--;
06080                         }
06081                         if (nkn > 1) {
06082                                 blend /= (double)nkn;
06083                                 nkn--;
06084                         }
06085                 }
06086                 result += data[k] * blend;
06087         }
06088 
06089         return(result);
06090 }
06091 
06104 int bezierColor(SDL_Surface * dst, const Sint16 * vx, const Sint16 * vy, int n, int s, Uint32 color)
06105 {
06106         int result;
06107         int i;
06108         double *x, *y, t, stepsize;
06109         Sint16 x1, y1, x2, y2;
06110 
06111         /*
06112         * Sanity check 
06113         */
06114         if (n < 3) {
06115                 return (-1);
06116         }
06117         if (s < 2) {
06118                 return (-1);
06119         }
06120 
06121         /*
06122         * Variable setup 
06123         */
06124         stepsize=(double)1.0/(double)s;
06125 
06126         /* Transfer vertices into float arrays */
06127         if ((x=(double *)malloc(sizeof(double)*(n+1)))==NULL) {
06128                 return(-1);
06129         }
06130         if ((y=(double *)malloc(sizeof(double)*(n+1)))==NULL) {
06131                 free(x);
06132                 return(-1);
06133         }    
06134         for (i=0; i<n; i++) {
06135                 x[i]=vx[i];
06136                 y[i]=vy[i];
06137         }      
06138         x[n]=vx[0];
06139         y[n]=vy[0];
06140 
06141         /*
06142         * Draw 
06143         */
06144         result = 0;
06145         t=0.0;
06146         x1=(Sint16)lrint(_evaluateBezier(x,n+1,t));
06147         y1=(Sint16)lrint(_evaluateBezier(y,n+1,t));
06148         for (i = 0; i <= (n*s); i++) {
06149                 t += stepsize;
06150                 x2=(Sint16)_evaluateBezier(x,n,t);
06151                 y2=(Sint16)_evaluateBezier(y,n,t);
06152                 result |= lineColor(dst, x1, y1, x2, y2, color);
06153                 x1 = x2;
06154                 y1 = y2;
06155         }
06156 
06157         /* Clean up temporary array */
06158         free(x);
06159         free(y);
06160 
06161         return (result);
06162 }
06163 
06179 int bezierRGBA(SDL_Surface * dst, const Sint16 * vx, const Sint16 * vy, int n, int s, Uint8 r, Uint8 g, Uint8 b, Uint8 a)
06180 {
06181         /*
06182         * Draw 
06183         */
06184         return (bezierColor(dst, vx, vy, n, s, ((Uint32) r << 24) | ((Uint32) g << 16) | ((Uint32) b << 8) | (Uint32) a));
06185 }
